name: Barry Lewis
text:
I know that places like Walmart Stores have been here for many years. I am an old hippie and old school school . Just personally the mom and pop have faded into history....I don't think I am the only human that has noticed the extinction of days gone by"Mom&Pop"stores. Most people don't like change...I know to survive in the era of technology the human equation has to change or get left out and sadly we have to adapt to a different environment. Don't take my bicentennial moments of rambling that seriously . I will say that my experience at Walmart today was very good.  More particular is that my squirrels and varieties of birds are really happy! Once again share stories and dine on songbird seeds that I purchased can not be found locally except Walmart or Amazon online.
Tonight's movie is a classic titled [Don't Bend Over In The Pea Patch cause Them Taters have Eyes]"FILM AT 11:00PM

name: Shamicka Dorsey
text: The people in the store is very nice and friendly! The furniture I ordered was nice and the price was very decent. The only reason I gave it 3 stars is because it took a month for my furniture to come back. I had someone set up to help me move it the day they told me it would be in but it didn't come in. So I had to end up paying the store 75 dollars for two pieces to be delivered to my home 2 miles from the store! The people in the store are awesome though. Not sure if I would order from them again because of the length it took to come back and I paid cash for my things!!

resp.text: Thank you for your taking the time to make a review. We do apologize for the experience you had with that store. There are some products that are not immediately available but the sales representative has the capability to show when products are available and update the customer on the status. Please feel free to reach out to the manager of this store and express your concerns and share with the manager how we can make your 3 star experience into a 5 star experience.

text: Ashley Furniture in Andalusia, Al is a great place to shop! Great customer service and friendly faces. They have really nice furniture, I have bought 2 bedroom suites, mattresses and recliners from them and I love all of it. I highly recommend them if you are looking to buy nice furniture.

resp.text: Thank you for your review and your business with our store. We will pass on your comments to the store. We look forward to your return for other product you may need.

name: Samantha Rudolph
text: We have always been satisfied with the service we received from Ashley Home Store. On August 1st they went above their service to help their customer. My husband was on his way to pick up a set of mattresses for our daughter who had recently moved to Andalusia. He encounter a storm when he arrived at the store the lights were off and no one answered the phone. He thought they were closed but the storm caused a power outage. He saw an Ashley Truck pull in so he followed. The sales person and the delivery men were so nice they delivered the mattress to keep them from getting ruined. Our prayers were answered. Thank you!

resp.text: Thank you for your review and your business with our store. We will pass on your comments to the store. We look forward to your return for other products you may need.

name: Rachel Jenkins
text: I bought a sectional from Ashley Furniture for an upstairs room.  The day of delivery I had the home builder on site because I was worried the sectional wouldn’t fit.  I was prepared to remove the door casing if needed to get the sectional into the room.  I told the delivery people to let me know if the casing needed to be removed.  They wedged the corner piece into the room without removing the casing.  The sectional is now permenantly stained with paint from the casing.  The wall and door casing in the entryway are also damaged.  I took photos to document and called Ashley furniture customer service department and spoke to Emily.  Emily sent a professional cleaner out, but the paint could not be removed.  I contacted Emily, and she told me she ordered me another wedge.  At this point, I don’t want to do any more damage. I asked her to discount the sectional and repair the damaged door casing, and I would be happy to keep the sectional with paint on it. Emily told me she could knock $75 off of the price.  I don’t consider that a discount after I paid for delivery and will have to take off work 2 days...once for the professional cleaners and once for the wall to be repaired.  I hope customer service can do more for me to make this right.

resp.text: We have looked into all the aspects of this and we can not find any customer in our database that has this issue. We don't have an Emily that works for us anywhere in the company but if you can please reach out to our store manager (JoAnn) so that we can help you get this resolved. Thank you

name: Phillip Morgan
text: I am from Andalusia and purchased several pieces of furniture from the Andalusia store. Shipping was delayed as that seems to be standard business these days, but Joann the store manager found a display couch in the warehouse got it approved and saved me a return trip to Auburn as we are moving our daughter in Saturday. If companies don't start thinking about customers as people many will be going out of business, thank you Joann for dealing in reality, you are the best.

resp.text: Thank you for your review and your business with our store. We will pass on your comments to the store personnel and we look forward to your return for other product you may need.

name: Kelsy Ward
text: I went in this store and purchased a couch and loveseat. I ordered it in a cobblestone color. Well, today my couches arrived and they are brown. I stopped the delivery men immediately and proceeded to call Joann at the store. After waiting 10-15 minutes on the phone while she looked for my order, she admitted she had written down the wrong number for the color I wanted. Mind you, I’ve already moved all my old furniture out of my living room, I have 2 kids, and my couches were to be delivered today. I was not expecting such a big error. So my solution was, I’ll keep the brown couches and you can just issue me a partial refund since it was your mistake. Do you know the only thing that she was willing to refund was the delivery fee? I thought a partial refund was fair to ask for since it was her error. Not pleased at all.

resp.text: We do apologize for this error and there is more options for us to make this right for you. We do pride ourselves on customer service. We will contact the store and speak to the manager and then contact you concerning this situation.

resp.text: Thank you for your review and your business with our store. We will pass on your comments to the store. We look forward to your return for other product you may need.

Wanted to express my thanks for the high level of service we received after our furniture purchase last year.
We purchased the Bladen Living room set from the Andalusia store and have been very pleased with the purchase. A few weeks ago we had a unfortunate incident occur when left 2 of our cushions damaged, and in need of replacement. I contacted Ashley Furniture and spoke with JoAnn. After explaining my situation, she without hesitation listened to my concerns, and made things right ordering 2 new items for our couch, receiving them a few weeks later.
You commonly do not see this level of attentiveness, and heightened customer service in retail, but Ashley furniture in Andalusia, it’s staff and management made the difference.

name: James Brooks
text: I highly recommend purchasing furniture here. The owner is a very kind man who you can tell has been in the business for a very long time. When purchasing something that can cost as much as furniture does now, it is important to purchase from someone who will honor their word. Not only did they offer several ways for us to finance, but delivery quick being recently relocated to this remote area in Alabama and no family to help move furniture was extremely nice. The owner gave us real honest advice not based off purely an income percentage of what he would receive on each piece. Because we were buying a complete living room and bedroom package including a mattress it was a big purchase and he was willing to help with the more that we purchased. I recently have had several back surgeries and the mattress was the most important piece. He personally spent quite a while with us walking through explaining the purpose of each detail on each mattress and again we were first time home buyers so we didn't really know what we were doing with buying a mattress; never had anything besides hand-me-downs. All in all an incredible experience and would recommend anyone who desires longevity with their purchase of something this magnitude to not buy second hand stuff and purchase from Harvey's where they keep their promises!!!!!!!

resp.text: Thank you very much for the great review.Sorry so long with reply,systemjust sent to me.Thanks.          Terry Harvey

Terrible store. Cops parked outside but not enforcing road laws. Sitting in 95+ degree heat waiting for people to do their job and bring bags to the car. People want 15/hr. But can’t do the simplest part of their job.

Walmart should go ahead and shut this one down. Not worth the money to upkeep, paying employees to not do their job. Trash.

Location currently has a good select of inventory. Staff seems to replenish inventory as it becomes available. *Friendly suggestion* if you see something you like, BUY IT THEN! (Most inventory doesn't last long and is RARELY duplicated)

Location is neat and orderly, however navigation in the aisles can become congested if directional floor signage not observed.

Staff is friendly, helpful and professional.

Overall, it was a pleasant shopping experience.

name: Matthew A.
text:
We purchased 6 teak chairs, a table, and a side table early last year (2017) for approximately $2000.  Within a few months, the backs of 2 chairs had come off.  A few months later, the back of a third chair came off.  Same story with 2 more chairs as we close out 2018.

These chairs are poorly made and do not last.  We brought this to the attention of the store owner or manager when the first two chairs broke, but she refused to assist claiming the chair damage was the result of misuse.  With five of six chairs failing within eighteen months, I have to disagree.

Do not buy teak furniture at this place of business!

resp.text:
Hi Matthew,
We pride ourselves in providing excellent customer support but we are unaware of this issue.
Please contact us at 251-939-3818 so we can look into this.
Kind regards,
Hendrik Engel
Owner

name: SantanaTyree
text:
SAVE YOURSELF THE TIME AND DO NOT GO HERE. See below:

The customer service was absolutely awful. If you are looking for a warm, inviting environment, RH at the Summit isn’t the place whatsoever. You will be completely disappointed if you receive the treatment we did. You will especially be disappointed and appalled if you had just left Bassett Furniture in Hoover where they took the time to do the following: cultivate a relationship, show you around their showroom, listen to what your needs are, and sit down to customize furniture based on your specifications. For lack of words, the feeling that my husband and I received at RH: “We are RH, our products speak for themselves, so we are not going to do our job at all. We are not going to try to educate them on our selections/options. I am not leaving my computer to assess their needs. If they want something, they’ll ask me then buy it.” The ONLY information we were given was about looking online and a RH book when we got ready to leave because I couldn’t take it any longer. Not once did the lady offer to look at fabrics with us, to go over color selections, discuss what their process was, etc. (We were wanting custom furniture for a spec home and this was stated.) When I asked a question, the response was very much short and NON-informative, I was told to look online which defeats the entire purpose of going in store. The lack of willingness to assist us has left a LASTING impression. Because of that, we are HAPPY to spend MORE elsewhere because of superb customer service. There are numerous competitors; a product can easily be mimicked, customer service can’t.

name: Vicki Dukes
text: I had been looking for a table and chairs for my kitchen. Found what I wanted online. I wasn’t ready to order, though, without seeing it. My husband and I made the 1.5 hour trip to Bham. I had talked to Loren on the phone before I came. When we got there, Loren helped us. She was very professional and knew what she was talking about. It was a very good experience.

name: Brian Panos
text: Nice stuff but pricey!

name: Jennifer Jones
text: Thank God for Rebekah!! I visited RH for the first time on 10/26 during my quick little birthday getaway. This was actually my first time EVER visiting an RH store. Rebekah greeted me enthusiastically. She was so nice and personable as she engaged with me and answered any and all questions that I had. I really enjoyed chatting with her. She was very cheerful, bubbly, and helpful. I really didn't sense the same vibe from the other few associates I saw standing around in the store. The guy who greeted me at the door was also warm ams and inviting. Thank you soooo much Rebekah for being so friendly and kind!!! Little did she know, I had just lost one of my closest friends to Covid-19 who was buried just that Saturday before. So, I was out and about trying to enjoy my birthday in spite of. This was my first visit to the Summit, and Rebekah was one the best experiences I had that day. She really need to spend time over at Saks and Seasons 52 training some of the sales associates and waiters on good customer service and how to demonstrate it. God bless you Rebekah!!

name: ivo horak
text: Bought a cloud with terrible cushions that don’t hold their fill just after a single use.   There is no way a cushion should have to be disconnected and fluffed every single time.    Now they told me that it would cost $1400 to replace them to cushions  that will hold their shape.   Extremely disappointed with a multi million dollar company that can’t remedy a simple problem.

name: Wallace Brown
text: Excellent service and great quality.

name: Quitta Williams
text: Really big zoo. Beautiful animals. We enjoyed it.

name: Sam Wilson
text: Our experience at this store has been maybe the best experience we have ever had. Rebecca Howsam is incredible. She is not only a pleasure to work with, she is friendly and helpful and always puts customer first.  She has went out of her way to make sure we are happy and love our furniture - both inside furniture and outside.  Thank you Rebecca.

name: Susan Hanley
text: If you could assign less than one star I certainly would. I just spent over 20 minutes in Restoration Hardware at the Summit waiting for someone to wait on me (or even speak to me) and obviously they do not need my business because they did not even acknowledge me although they looked over at me several times. There were three sales associates and at the very beginning they were each with someone but then one became available when her customer left and she immediately disappeared to the back of the store. Again keep in mind they all saw me and said nothing and when the sales rep  finally came back out from wherever she went, another person  walked into the store and she asked if she could help them. Wow! I wanted to purchase a king bedroom suite I saw in their catalog which would have been well over a $10k purchase but I guess they do not need my business. I’m taking it somewhere that someone will actually acknowledge you  walked into their store.

name: Peyton Preece
text: We have spent over $15,000 in furniture from RH, live 2.5 hours away and pay over $350 for shipping each time we order or buy something. They were unwilling to replace a defective rug (they deemed it defective) and discount another rug we were willing to buy. Do yourself a favor and go elsewhere.

text: Love the decor

name: Brian Robertson
text: Very good

name: Eric Wilson

name: g hegenbarth
text: Must haves and stuff

name: Erin Young
text: About a month ago I came into the Ashley furniture outlet location to look for a chaise sofa for my first apartment since recently graduating college. Jordan was a great help and I just got my sofa delivered today and I love it! Jordan was patient and helped me narrow down my decision. Her fun personality made her a joy to work with. I also really appreciate her staying in touch with me via text throughout the whole process to make sure I didn’t have any unanswered questions and to keep me updated.

resp.text: Thank you for your review! We are so glad to hear that Jordan was able to give you a great furniture buying experience. We hope you will visit us again!

name: Carrie Hughes
text: Horrible! My husband and I went into the store March 13, 2021, purchased a Recliner, Love Seat and Couch, Mattress and Box Spring. The sales guy told us takes 6-8 weeks for delivery ( He lied .. he was just trying to make  a sale). We paid in Full and also have on our CONTRACT Delivery 5/3/2021!!!! Checked on the status and it was then pushed back to JULY 26, 2021!!! Now July is here and now they are saying  it would be now September/October!!!!! We spoke to the Manager JOSH and he would not do refund!!! We are now with out furniture for our new house that we we paid in full!  They are seriously scamming people.. I will NOT ever buy here again!! Seems like this has happened ALOT to several other customers. They care nothing about their customers and ONLY about making a sale!! We are now in the process of taking legal actions due to them breaking their contract with us 3 different times!! I will not wait around until October for my furniture to only have them tell me AGAIN its been pushed back on delivery!  GO SOMEWHERE ELSE FOR FURNITURE!!!!!!

resp.text: Ms. Hughs. I am sorry to hear that your experience has been this bad at the Ashley Outlet. This is certainly not up to our standards. We would like to reach out to you to resolve this issue. If you will, please send us your Name, Number and email, and potentially your receipt number to Cescalation@ahsmal.com. We would like a member of our management team to help you on this issue and make things right.

name: Glenn Taylor
text: We went in for a couch and love seat.  Met by Mario, who helped us with selection and options.  Everything was clear, pricing made sense, and Mario took the time to explain what comes, for example, with the protection plan.  He wasn't pushy, just helpful, and he knew his stuff.  Strongly recommend this store and especially Mario.

resp.text: Thank you for your review! We are so glad to hear that Mario was able to give you a great furniture buying experience. We hope you will visit us again!

name: Leigh Anne Dagalea
text: I purchased Doorbuster sectional on layaway in March 2021. I completely paid it at the beginning of April 2021. From the time I fully purchased it in April to the end of May. No one had informed me of the status. I would call the store once every other week. When I called the facility they told me that the furniture was not showing delivery date. I showed concern that I have not received any possible delievery date and asked to speak to the store manager about finding another item with tbe same value that is available. Finally the store manager, (after I was concerned) said that it should be here the first week of June. I decided to not find a replacement since the manager seemed to be sure the furniture will be there. I called after the first week of June since I received no contacted in regards to delivery or any issues. Manager than proceeded to say it is now pushed to the first week of July. I received a call last week and the week prior telling me that my furniture was scheduled for first week of July. After first week of July passed, I called them Monday, July 12th, to be informed that it was again pushed to the week of July 26th. I asked the sales associate if I could get a full refund because their poor communication. And customer service makes me uneasy and I do not trust them that they will delivery my item. The manager was not there and the person said he will contact me on Wednesday when he returns. They told me that refund would not be possible because of the 72 hour no cancellation. I proceeded to call cooperate to file a complaint on their store and because it is privately owned they could not help me. They filed a complaint and said they will get in contact with me within 24-48 hours. After I received no response from cooperate and the store, I called cooperate again. During the process of calling cooperate on Friday, July 16th (less than four days since the last conversation with the store) I found out that the corner of my section is in the warehouse but that other pieces will be in august 26th. Again another time pushed and no response. Each time the dates have been undetermined or pushed further. There is no promise of a secure date. They are persistent on telling me cancellations are not possible due to the 72 hours after full purchase but yet this company does not hold themselves accountable to communication and delivery if their items. After long conversation, the sales associate on Friday, July 16th said the manager will issue a request for cancellation to the finance department and I will receive a paper check refund. I called today July 20th to ask about the status. The request was given to the finance department and now waiting for the finance department to contact me about my refund. The sales associate said that it will take up to 14 days. This is ridiculous. I understand that we are in Covid 19 times. But their customer service is lacking and their concern for their customers is lacking.

resp.text: Hello Ms. Dagalea. I would like to apologize on behalf of the Ashley Homestore Outlet. We strive to better ourselves every day. Customer service is no different. We are working hard to become efficient with everything we do in our company, I have showed this review to our General Manager, and he would like to reach out to you. Please send an email to Cescalation@ahsmal.com with your receipt, name and phone number, as well as the email that was used on file. We want to make things right.

name: Palina Luangkhot
text: I would definitely recommend coming here for all your furniture needs. They have a great selection and Jordan helped me throughout the whole process! She made everything fast and easy. I will be going back for my future furniture purchases.

resp.text: Thank you for your review! We are so glad to hear that Jordan was able to give you a great furniture buying experience. We hope you will visit us again!

text: It was my first time in the store I was led by someone one to Try Ashley Discount store. I was already in the area so that made it very easy. Location is perfect. Soon as I walked in I was greeted by Mario and he immediately asked me did I needed any help. I told him what I wanted and he took me straight to what I was looking for. Even though the delivery is a little off the great customer service Mario delivered is what sold me. He told me everything I needed to know very detailed on the dates and kept it real. And I was in and out ! So that’s a plus! Thanks Mario !

name: James Boyer
text:
We have a lot of Ashley Furniture. We ordered nearly $7,000 worth of furniture on April 18/2021 with a estimated delivery date of 5/31/2021. It is now 7/19/2021 and we still have NO furniture. We just got off the phone and the estimate delivery date for some of the furniture is not until DECEMBER!

So, if you want to pay thousands of dollars for furniture that you will not get for 8 months, then this is your place.

We have been living in our home with our kids on mattresses on the floor, no living room furniture, no dining room furniture, incomplete office furniture, etc, etc.

No more excuses for companies operating like this. We are now fighting for our money back that has been wrapped up for many months so we can go somewhere that sells furniture and not just dreams of "someday" furniture.

Absolutely awful.

resp.text: Hello. I am sorry to hear about your experience, and on behalf of the Ashley Outlet I would like to apologize. If you will, please send us an email at Cescalation@ahsmal.com with your name, receipt number, phone number and email and a member of our management team will be with you as soon as we can.

name: Alysha Meighan
text: Came in with my family and we were greeted by  Mario. He introduced himself, got our names, and said to let him know if we needed anything. He walked away and didn’t hover uncomfortably like other places have sales people do. After browsing a bit he came back to check on us and proceeded to help us look through dozens of options and ultimately decide on the right package for what we were looking for. Mario was great, management was great, and the shopping system was appropriate.

text: Good selection and good prices. Kind of a creepy staff. The salesperson told us they'd 'check on us later' but never got more than 3 feet away from us. Any time I turned around, BOOM! Salesperson.

name: myla harper
text: It’s been three weeks now and I’m still not a happy customer. Please refer to Ashley Homestore’s Facebook page to see my review in detail. The sales clerk ordered the wrong item. The delivery team did not honor their delivery time slot and did not have the decency to inform me in a timely manner that they were coming 2 hours early. They left the wrong dresser. I called Emmitt, the store manager, and requested for them to return to pick up the dresser, needless to say the dresser remained in my home for three weeks. I tried to contact the general manager, Nick on two occasions and, Emmitt was of no assistance and he never returned my phone calls either. After finally getting a scheduled pickup a week and a day later, the delivery team was an hour and 15 minutes late with once again no phone call or text. After posting my experience on their Facebook page, Nick called leaving a message with my phone number as the return contact. Also, someone from their management team left an email address that was not accurate. I say all this to say, my concerns have not been resolved and I did not receive the correct dresser that I paid for. Ashley Homestore will NOT admit their mistakes, correct their mistakes, nor treat their customers with respect. I spent right at $6000 and this is how they treat their customers. I pray that you read this review and reconsider patronizing this establishment.

resp.text: Hello. We have seen your review and want to make things right. If you will, please send us an email at cescalation@ahsmal.com with the name, email, and phone number on your ticket, and a team member will be with you as soon as we can. We appreciate your support and business.

name: Anjelica Richardson
text: Mario made ordering furniture super easy! Thank you so much for all your help!!

name: sawaski jackson
text: Mario is a respectable salesman that gives you space to venture on your own. He is knowledgeable and when he doesn't know something he is willing to locate an associate immediately. Thnaks for a good experience.

name: T Trask
text: Dee Dee was friendly and very helpful from the time I entered the store. Of course, one of the big "dogs" Alex came over to assist her BUT I will say, I didn't purchased anything I didn't want. In addition, the discounts were my stamp of approval. Thanks Dee Dee and Alex for your great customer service.

name: Lucero Montoya
text: Thank you to Josh for helping and being very thorough with our questions.  If you are looking for new furniture for your home, get Josh to help! He’s the best! Super professional and friendly.

name: william gipson
text: On March 20, 2021 I purchased a complete Leather reclining sofa, love seat and chair set in which I paid for upfront in full. Josh and I agreed on a (out the door) price that he stated would included free delivery and would include the best warranty that I could purchase. Once I got to the register to check out I was charged an additional 199.00 that was supposed to have been already applied to our agreed upon total. I didn't notice until after I left and looked over the receipt of this infraction. They told me that the set wasn't in stock and would take 3 weeks to be delivered. I offered several time to pick the set up myself but they insisted that I let them bring it out and set it up for free so I agreed. They told me that the set would come in a different dates and offered me split delivery. I told them I'd prefer if we just wait an get it all delivered at 1 time when it all arrived and they agreed. Fast forward to Thursday April 8th I called and was told that only 2 pieces were in but they were all scheduled to be there the week of the 8th. Friday the 9th I called bk and was told that the set was there. I asked when would it be delivered and was told that I had to come pick it up and that it wouldn't be delivered. Therefore I (rented) a haul and angrily went to to their store to pick it up. Once I got there I was told that it wasn't there and was at the warehouse which contradicted everything that I was told and wasn't where I originally paid for the set. At this point I was furious and Josh wasn't there so I was told. They then called him/Josh and he magically appeared from the back of the store smiling with mischief all over his face. Once he got close enough to see the anger in my eyes he detoured behind me and finally stood behind the counter accompanying the other 2 young ladies. He lied and tried to tell me that I wasn't given or offered free delivery but one of the assistants who also helped me select the set( she in particular was great and very helpful and even apologized) agreed that I was supposed to have free delivery. I then told him about the split delivery in which I knew nothing about until they offered and he dropped his head knowing that I was being honest. At this point I was furious but still needed my set. They then told me that it was at the warehouse and that the warehouse was closed. This is after they told me that it was at their location and I had to come pick it up. So now I'm standing there with a rented uhaul, being double charged for a warranty, furious and still not able to get my furniture. Long story short I still have to go pick it up again today. I would've canceled it all together but your charged a  25% restocking fee and can't return it over 3 days after the original purchase date. Josh continued to try and lie and say he told me this or that and I made him out to be a lie everytime. Josh is a lier so don't let those fb commercials fool you. My set was over 4k and paid upfront. Read over your receips as soon as you get it and make sure everything you agreed upon is stated and accurate. This is my personal experience, hopefully this will detour you from having a disastrous nightmare just as I did. Please shop else where. Hopefully everything goes smooth today once I go to pick it up.

resp.text: Hello Mr. Gipson. Firstly, I would like to apologize for any miscommunications or any tribulations experienced with the Ashley Homestore Outlet. From my understanding of the matter, there were many miscommunications on the team's behalf. I am not sure why there was so much confusion with the Customer Service on this particular order, and this will be addressed to them. We are experiencing delays on orders due to covid, and though this is a common response for almost all things furniture nowadays, it is honestly the truth. Again, I would like to apologize for the lack of communication resulting in you prematurely renting a U-haul. Our Warehouse hours differ from the store hours, and this should have been addressed upfront ahead of time. I truly feel that if things had been communicated better, a lot of these issues would have been easily resolved, and that is our fault. On behalf of the company we hope you will accept our apology, and please feel free to discuss this matter further at cescalations@ahsmal.com, and a manager will respond.  With all this said, we want to thank you for shopping with us and appreciate you being a member of our community. We are striving daily to improve our business to ensure that things like this no longer happen.

name: Joseph Brewton
text: Was in the market for a bedroom set and our sales associate Mario knocked it out the park! He was knowledgeable and got us what we wanted!

resp.text: We would like to thank you for taking the time to give us a review! ☺️ We are glad to hear how the staff treated you and your family, and look forward to hopefully seeing you in the future. We appreciate you and your business.

name: R Lane
text: Walked in to purchase a recliner and immediately was greeted by an employee wearing a mask around his chin that got way too close. Walked a few steps further and saw another employee wearing his mask around his chin as well. The purpose of a mask is to cover your mouth and nose, not your chin. Protecting your customers should be a top concern. We immediately walked out to shop elsewhere that follows COVID guidelines.

resp.text: Hello. We have seen your review and want to make things right. If you will, please send us an email at cescalation@ahsmal.com with the name, email, and phone number on your ticket, and a team member will be with you as soon as we can. We appreciate your support and business.

name: Mr. Hollowan
text: Amazing sales representatives and customer service representatives thank you guys for being my furniture experts will be back soon

name: Jim Thorton
text: Everyone was so helpful. Best place to get your funiture. I would give everyone that helpped me 10 stars.

name: Dan O
text: Very pleasant experience. Courteaus staff, and speedy professional service.

name: Courtney Jerrell
text: Jaya was terrific! Amazing customer service and so sweet!

name: Marcus Kennedy
text: The people there really know what they are doing. They go the extra mile to find you what you need. Lots of options to chose from.

name: Darrelle Townsend
text: Me and my fiancé drove 2.5 hours away to go to this new outlet on its Grand Opening day that we saw advertised on Facebook. We were greeted by a salesman named Alex. He seemed to be a nice guy well versed and educated in product knowledge of everything they had to showcase and sell. We instructed him that we were just looking but we'd come back if we were interested in doing business. He and his manager promised exceptional customer service. We came back about a month later ready to purchase. We spent almost $7,000 with this salesman and company and was sold several empty promises. We were told that we'd have all of our furniture at the store ready to be delivered to our brand new home that we were building by the first week of December. That didn't happen. We were promised several different customer service calls concerning our furniture. They never happened. In December we were told for 3 weeks straight that our stuff was coming and it didn't come. Finally we got some of our things only to find out that as our stuff was coming off the truck that the delivery guys forgot the mounts to put our mirror up that goes to our dresser. Also that Alex ordered 2 loveseats instead of a sofa and loveseat. When I called to make him aware of his mistake I was told immediately that it was my fault as if I made up the invoice myself. I spoke with the manager Josh he apologized and put in a new invoice for a new sofa. He said that our recliner which we are still waiting on would be here the same time the sofa would, which would be Jan. 15th. I was told that if anything changed that I would receive a call. Guess what? That didn't happen either. After the delivery guys left I noticed that they messed up my front door casing in 2 different places. I called this Thursday to inform them of the damage and check to make sure everything was still on track and yet again I was given the run around by the employees and manager Josh as to when my stuff would arrive. Finally he said that yet again its been pushed back to the first week in February. He gave me Ashley's customer service email to send proof of damage and I was told I would receive a call or email concerning the damages as you might've guessed THAT! DIDN'T! HAPPEN!  Before ending our call he said he was going to give me a call the next day at 9:30 when he starts his customer service calls and you guessed it IT NEVER HAPPENED! Mind you we placed our entire order at one time in OCTOBER!!! We were told that there was a 6-8 week wait to receive our stuff which we were fine with because our home would be finished being built by then. It's now January and still were being given the run around. I have never experienced such unprofessionalism, deplorable customer service, and lies by a company who's standards are supposed to be way above par. I am livid and hate that I ever gave this company my business. They care nothing about their customers only about the quick buck that they can get. I wouldn't advise anyone to ever do business with this establishment. Your just another sale to them and they give you nothing but empty promises. If I could've given no stars I would have! WORST EXPERIENCE EVER!!!

name: Margaret Tobin
text:
Can’t say enough about the quality and beauty of this furniture. Bought the love seat, the serving table, counter height bistro table and four matching stools. Amazed at how easy the pieces were to put together, how comfortable they are to sit in. My guests are relaxed but feel special at the same time.

Chic Teak provides excellent customer service, specific and clear communication and really care about their products. They offer videos on how to put the furniture together and how to best care for your item. The furniture came fast and was packed carefully.

resp.text: Thanks Margaret, we love your review. Come see us again!

name: Dean Kotecki
text:
Excellent Customer Service, on time delivery and a great product.  We have had countless other umbrellas at varying price points that last 1 or 2 seasons; make the investment and purchase something that is high quality at a great price.

Sun Garden Umbrella is a clear step above and far better quality than the same old umbrellas at the national retailers.  The price is fantastic compared to other "commercial" style umbrellas.

Assembly was easy and and the positioning, rotation, opening/closing is a breeze. 360 degree rotation with up/down movement that locks securely.

My wife loves how easy it is to open and position.

Purchase the extra Sun Cape, it is well worth it and it fits perfectly.

Don't forget to fill the base, 5 bags of pea gravel from the local hardware store was all that it took.

Pay attention to your clearances, the base will weigh close to 300 lbs when filled with gravel.

Ours is positioned on the west side of the patio to block the late afternoon sun.

This large umbrella provides us with the option of having full sun when we want it verus a fixed roof pergola or permanent structure with a roof.

Sun Garden and Chic Teak are great.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words.

name: Gary Steinberg
text:
This umbrella is excellent quality and elegant. We’re using it on a roof top and it seems quite durable even in slightly windy conditions.
I would recommend it.

name: Dave Hall
text: Great piece of furniture. Solid and well made. Was very impressed with the quality and the efficiency of the delivery process.  Once we got the teak oil on it, it matched our dining room furniture perfectly! Would highly recommend!

resp.text: Thanks Dave! Happy Memorial Day!

name: Z G
text:
I purchased the "7 Piece Teak Wood Antigua Patio Counter Height Bistro Set with 63" Rectangular Table and 6 Stools"

This dining set is absolutely beautiful!! It's sturdy and well built and shipping was very quick. Scheduling the delivery was well communicated and everything arrived in great condition. Simple assembly, just needed to attach the legs to the table.

The table is great for indoors or outdoors. We currently are enjoying it indoors because the weather has been a bit chilly (by SoCal standards), but we previously had it outside for about a month and hasn't really shown any wear from the few rainy days we had where it was sitting in a bit of a puddle. Really really happy with this purchase! Would love to buy more pieces from them in the future, I already have my eye on a few items!

resp.text: Thank you, come see us again.

name: Danny Heatly
text: We bought the 7 piece Santa Monica Bistro set and couldn't be more pleased with the entire experience with Chic Teak.  The shipping was quick and efficient and customer service was great to work with.  The quality and beauty of the set are outstanding - it is just what we were looking for to add a dining function to our patio.

resp.text: Thank you for your kinds words.We hope you will enjoy your furniture.

name: Brother Seraphim
text:
A chair from Chic Teak has come to me for use that is one of the two most comfortable chairs I've ever used, from the way the curves of the arms, back, and seat fit one's body so well. That is so, even without any cushion.  It must be a genius who designed it!
Further, I found encouraging help in facing the fact that another's attempt to assemble the chair had gone awry, leaving me to do a little mending and asking for replacement hardware, including a substitute for some that was no longer in current use. This kindly service was given promptly and cheerfully.
In the photo included are some other fine pieces of furniture from Chic Teak.  Personally, I find teak a very nice wood.

resp.text: Thanks Brother, glad we could help you out.

name: Jeff Ponkratz
text: I'm writing to share my recent positive experience with Chic Teak furniture and their equally extraordinary customer service.  My wife has had this vision of sitting under a back yard arbor watching the sunsets over Florida's gulf coast since we retired here.  Building the arbor was easy.  The hard part was in identifying the bench she could share with loved ones in what has now become a nightly ritual.  I researched various teak furniture sites and determined that Chic Teak products would provide an inviting comfortable bench that would match the beauty of the sunsets.  I wanted a classy, well-made, easy-to-maintain product and ordered the Lutyens bench for two.  It arrived quicker than I expected, but a key piece was damaged during shipping.  I called the company's customer service representative and received a complete replacement with three days.  I assembled the product within two hours (strongly suggest you watch the YouTube video in addition to the accompanying diagram) and it has quickly become the talk of our neighborhood.  It's absolutely gorgeous!  Sturdy with Grade A Teak throughout. We're expecting all of our adult children for a spring break visit next week and my wife is pumped about sharing her "favorite piece of furniture" with them.  Thank you Chic Teak for striving to maintain a high standard in all aspects.

resp.text: Thanks Jeff!

name: David Poff
text: We purchased an umbrella from them and the delivery was fast and convenient.  When received, the umbrella had an issue and they were very helpful in resolving the issue and spoke to the manufacturer on our behalf!  They were very attentive and quick to resolve the issue!  Great customer service!!  I would definitely purchase from them again!

resp.text: Glad we could help you out David. Don't hesitate to contact us again.

name: Sully Ro
text: The dining table looked awesome. I fell in love with it immediately the color of it matches my dining chairs perfectly. I was nervous that it would be too big for my small dinning room area but it turned out perfect. I can't wait to order more pieces, the price was very reasonable. My coworker loved my table so much she ordered one as well. Thank you guys I love my table.

resp.text: Thank Sully!

name: Carol Hopperton
text: Great company with great products.   They are my ‘go to’ place for furniture. I have ordered multiple items for onward shipment to the Bahamas so I rely totally on their website, reviews and customer service to make furniture purchases as I have no opportunity to return items. This is one of very few companies I trust enough to do this. I am extremely happy with our purchases

resp.text: Great to hear, thanks Carol.

name: karen stolee
text: When your customer service problem is addressed and solved, including shipping of replacement product, within 6 hours you know this is a company with extraordinary commitment to its customers. Phone calls from Alabama to Toronto from General Manager Clint S.  were so appreciated. Love Chic Teak products and will be singing their praises to anyone who wants beautiful teak furniture. I now have three outdoor teak side tables for my deck - 1 Tundra round and 2 Titanic folding.

resp.text: Thanks Karen, enjoy!

name: David Bobbitt
text: My wife and I love the Chic Teak experience.  We ordered these right before we moved from near Foley, Alabama to Murrell's Inlet, South Carolina.  First of all, I would like to say that all of my interactions with the staff at Chic Teak were quite positive and professional.  We are very happy with the look, comfort, sturdiness, and value we received with this purchase.  I would highly recommend Chic Teak to my friends and family.

resp.text: Thank you, love the picture.Enjoy!

name: Andrea Heller
text: Ordering from Chic Teak was an amazing experience. I was nervous ordering from a company that I didn’t know but I give them an A+ in customer service, ease of ordering, the quality of the product, and delivery. They emailed me and called several times to give me information or to just make sure I was satisfied. They even emailed me back on a Sunday night! I definitely recommend Chic Teak!

resp.text: That's really nice, thank you.

name: kimberly burns
text: Beautiful table with superb customer service.  My table arrived well packed, on time and was easy to assemble. The table is a statement piece- it is stunning. The customer service was professional, knowledgeable and so helpful.

resp.text: Thanks Kimberly!

name: Alicia Smith
text: We purchased the 10' indoor teak bar table in Gulf Shores, AL six years ago to use as our Dining Room Table and cannot begin to tell you how many compliments we have received since. EVERYONE who sees it LOVES it! We seat 8 persons (4 bar stools on each side) very comfortable with plenty of room at each end for food and drinks. We purchased different colored leather bar stools from Levinger.com and they are a perfect compliment for this beautiful piece of art. It is so versatile - we use it for tax prep - I can spread everything out and leave it for days without compromising space for eating, wrapping presents, eating and, during the pandemic our daughter has used one end of it for her remote-learning school desk and has loved it. Even with schoolwork spread out, there was still plenty of room for a dinner party on the other end! It is a blessing after so many years to walk through our dining room and feel as much admiration and love for our table today as we did on the day we purchased it. Thank you!

resp.text: WOW, that picture is absolutely gorgeous, thank you.

name: Jay Tindel
text: I love my chairs from Chic Teak. They are very well made and go very nice with my table and bench.

resp.text: THANKS JAY!

name: David Anderson
text: Simply an extraordinary chair. We found it after doing a search for a unique accent chair for our new home, and could not be happier. Quality of workmanship is outstanding. Staff is incredible too, and shipping was fast. Was told it is their most popular chair.

resp.text: Thanks David!

name: Lisa Alexander
text: The table is beautiful! The craftsmanship and design is beyond gorgeous! Solidly built and simple to assemble. Customer service was fantastic and so was delivery! Looking forward to using it all summer!!!

name: Pam Burkes
text: After twice ordering from another retailer, and having our table arrive each time broken, I decided to go directly to Chic Teak.   I'm so glad I did. Our bar table arrived quickly and in perfect condition.   The process was seamless and the people I dealt with were amazingly understanding of plight and professional.   We could not be happier with our experience.   Thank you Chic Teak.

text: Absolutely beautiful, well-built bench. Will be a focal point in our yard for years to come. It's nice to find a company that stands behind their product and cares about their customers. We had a problem with damage done by the shipper and Clint and Chic Teak went above and beyond to make everything right. They checked in with us every step of the way and were so helpful with everything. Will definitely buy from them again.

resp.text: Thanks Kim!

name: Johanna Sophie Sangiuliano
text: Chic Teak's furniture is wonderful: Well made, sturdy and beautiful. The foldable bar table is exactly what we needed for our small outdoor patio. The stools fit so well that I ordered a second set! Plus, the customer service at Chic Teak is first rate. Thank you, Clint, Hendrik and team!

text: I love, love, love my new table! I’ll admit that I was reluctant to purchase this type of item online and sight unseen. I am another very happy and satisfied customer.  The communication throughout the process was excellent! I highly recommend Chic Teak.

text: Recently refinished 2 steam loungers and then ordered a matching set of cushions from Chic Teak. They fit perfectly and are very high quality material. Very satisfied!

Chic Teak is professional and was willing to hold a glass top table for me until my condo was ready for move in.  In addition, they could find my new build location, which my son told me a good delivery company couldn’t even do yet.

I wish the glass top were mounted to the stand, but it doesn’t appear to be a problem.  The table is also much lighter than I expected.

The table is gorgeous and adds the perfect, unique statement for my new space.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words.

text: I purchased a buffet from Chic Teak and was very satisfied with the quality and condition of the item upon delivery. Granted it was curbside delivery, but it was a beautiful day and had help carrying it inside the house. Thank you ☺️

name: Natalie Edery
text:
Just sitting and enjoying the setting that our teak table will be enjoyed in for years to come.  Just add a few wine glasses to the scene!

The beauty and utility of this teak furniture is outstanding, truly a quality product.  We really appreciate how well ChicTeak has responded to our requests and resolved them to our satisfaction.  So glad we made this purchase, and will absolutely  recommend ChicTeak to friends.

resp.text: Thanks Natalie, glad you like it.

name: F16 Pilot
text: I purchased the 48" Teak Root Console table.  The packaging was incredible. I could have built an addition to my home with all the wood they used to crate the table. Table came out flawless and has made the space it occupies, astonishing.  Chic Teak bent over backwards to give me the best price and delivered the exact day that I needed.  Awesome company, awesome product.

resp.text: Thanks Alan!

name: Jack Sanderson
text: I ordered a small patio dining set from Chic Teak and couldn’t be happier with the product. It’s really beautiful and just what we wanted for our patio breakfast “nook.” The customer service experience also was fantastic. Chic Teak has products on other sites, like Wayfair, but please do yourself a favor and order from them directly. From the thank you email from their President to the single best shipping experience I've had during COVID, It reminded me of what a company can do when it is customer focused. They have a great product - the furniture is beautiful - and they make the experience of buying and shipping so easy.  As I’ve just moved into a new house in Kingston, NY, I’ve had a quite a number of deliveries. Most of the big carriers, FedEx in particular, have been pretty awful. Packages delivered on different days than promised, delivered to the wrong house, etc. But R&L got everything right. If I could give 10 stars to the overall Chic Teak experience, I would!

resp.text: Thanks Jack, enjoy!

name: Elizabeth Abel
text: This counter height table was an amazing find!  I got exactly what I was wishing for and the table is beautiful.  It was easy to put together and feels very sturdy.  Yay!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words.

name: JudyAndGreg Romano
text: STUNNING! I ordered several outdoor pieces from Chic Teak. They arrived in a WOODEN crate so NO damage. The workmanship and quality is unbelievable. I even went back for more items. The price for the quality is astounding. The customer service - unsurpassed. This company sets a standard others don't even come close to.

resp.text: Thanks!

name: Sandy White
text: I purchased a teak dining table and a teak buffet table from Chik Teak. The quality is outstanding as well as the customer service of the company. Both pieces were packed well and I received both items very quickly and with free shipping.

name: CYNTHIA ENTZEL
text: Great company! Arrived on time and very carefully wrapped. I have others in my family who are building a house and will be ordering soon. Can’t wait to see their pieces! Thanks ChicTeak!

name: Cathy Fitzpatrick
text: I ordered a teak root table and it far surpasses my expectations.  It’s gorgeous wood-highly polished and so unique.  Even better I placed a second and much smaller order and received a thank you.   I haven’t ever had that happen!  The care and attention to detail speaks volumes for this business.  I highly recommend this vendor and will continue to do business with them

resp.text: Thanks Cathy.

name: P P (PRP_TX)
text: Good quality teak swing we purchased from Chic Teak.  Product is exactly as described. It was packaged safely for transport.  The only minor negative is that the swing comes with rope instead of chain.  Not a huge problem, I ordered my own thru Grainger.

resp.text: Thanks Priti!

name: Dino Fritz
text: We ordered two teak root tables and they look amazing. During the first shipment the large table top glass broke. After we contacted them Clint made sure that we were taken care of. They shipped us another glass top so fast that i was amazed. Thanks again for everything! these tables look great!

name: Christi Whalen
text: All items online, no showroom. Super helpful local staff, beautiful furniture at a reasonable price. So excited to find Chic Teak and look forward to buying from them again!

resp.text: Hi Christi, glad to see that we could help you. Feel free to contact us anytime, that's what we're here for.

name: NY Plantings
text:
These folks here have a solid 5 star rating because they deserve it.
Real traditional American culture in making sure that clients are happy.
I truly wish this company and owners the best and hope to work with them again in the future.

Todd Nappi from Newyorkplantings.com

resp.text: Thanks Todd, very much appreciated.

name: Allison Della Bella
text:
I love my new 43” root system coffee table! It arrived in about a week and I couldn’t be happier. All questions and inquiries were answered promptly. The shipping container was damaged in transit but thankfully no damage was done to the table itself. That is at no fault of chic teak.
This table was much less expensive then others I was looking at. It matches perfectly with the style I am going for in our new home. Definitely a statement piece. I will recommend Chic Teak to all my friends and I hope to buy more pieces from them in the future.

resp.text: Thanks Allison, glad all worked out.

name: Jennifer Lawrence
text: I placed my order and it was delivered in one week. I had been looking for a high quality piece and the Venice Media cabinet was it. The package was extremely well wrapped and arrived without any damage. This is a very well made piece of solid teak furniture. We plan on keeping this in the family for the next generation and more to come. You will not be disappointed with this, you will be stunned! I did choose to apply to teak oil to mine, as that is how my other teak furniture is finished, however it is beautiful as is.

resp.text: Thanks Jennifer, come see us again!

name: Amy Conrad
text: I bought a gorgeous recycled teak media console. It arrived very quickly and is just as pictured on the website. The craftsmanship is really good and so is the wood quality. The staff at Chic Teak is also really helpful. This is not mass-produced furniture -- it's made by artisans. And since it's good teak, no matter what my kids manage to do to it, it will still look good. Do yourself a favor and check out Chic Teak -- this is the kind of furniture you keep forever.

resp.text: Thanks Amy 👍

name: Brad Byk
text: Great selection. The quality was as advertised. Easy to order, delivery as promised, great value.

resp.text: Thanks Brad!

name: Chad Long
text:
I never post reviews, however I have to say that shopping at ChicTeak was a great experience.   I still enjoy courtesy, and I like to feel valued as a customer.

The Pros at Chic Teak followed up with a thank you from the owner.  The GM and more of their team followed up to communicate shipping and eta details.  They provided immediate responses and backed up their word with actions before during and after the sale.

Not only great, unique furniture that is sure to be a talking point, but also world class customer service.   Every time I need furniture, I’m starting my search with Chic Teak.

resp.text: Thanks Chad!

text: The media center is beautifully built and hand crafted. Chic Teak has a great team making furniture. If you appreciate hand crafted workmanship you will love their products!!

text: I ordered the 43 inch root ball coffee table and when it arrived, I was absolutely blown away by the beauty and quality of this product. Excellent job and thank you for a wonderful piece of furniture

text: The chair is rather large, sturdy, comfortable and a quality piece. The craftsmanship is excellent. The wood is 100% beautiful teak with smooth wood and rounded edges. The peanut shape is extremely comfortable to sit in and nice enough for living room, but it’s intended for outdoor living. The delivery was fast. I loved working with everyone at Chic Teak

name: John Hogan
text:
I want the share our great satisfaction with Chic Teak, the Teak Coffee Table arrived in a very will built, boxed container, with no damage via Freight delivery company R&L.  The shipping box was so well  constructed, I had my neighbor come over to help take it apart.
After the initial uncrating there it was, The Most Beautiful Teak Wood Coffee Table a person would ever want.  We have had it just two days now and the whole neighborhood has seen it and agreed, well constructed and finished!!!!!!  Beautiful in appearance..  Wonderful company to deal with, They maintained contact by e mail from the day I ordered this for my wife until It arrived, and  great follow up by Mr. Clint Shires General Manager of Chic Teak.
This in one Review I really enjoy writing and the company and product truly earned my praise!!!!!!!!!!   John Hogan - Palmview, Texas

text: I ordered and received a teak root sofa table from Chic Teak.  I received this table really quickly!  I absolutely LOVE my table.  It is more beautiful than the  great picture of it!  Thank you Chic Teak!  I'll be purchasing more items from your store!
