name: RCS Ltd
text:
Truly Functional Art
What a refreshing change to deal with people who actually appreciate your business! The folks at Chic Teak are extremely responsive and helpful and the table is now the centerpiece of our living room. Absolutely gorgeous - a show stopper! Everyone who sees it is wowed. Highly recommend this purchase if you are considering it.

resp.text: Thank you for your nice review.

name: Carol Cummings
text: This furniture is elegant and comfortable.  The service and delivery were professional and friendly.  I highly recommend Chic Teak!

resp.text: Thanks Carol!

name: Greg Fast
text: My wife and I love the rustic, cheerful reclaimed boat teak furniture and have  purchased three pieces, all of which arrived timely.  There was a problem with one piece but that problem was resolved very quickly.  Bottom line:  Great product from a responsible company that is attentive to the purchaser's interests.

resp.text: Thanks Greg!

name: Jonathan Gonick-Hallows
text:
Bought 4 Tundra end tables after looking at dozens of different tables from multiple companies. Always hard to choose teak furniture online as there are so many choices at various prices and levels of quality. These looked good online, were the right size and priced kind of in the middle to low-middle range. I already have a lot of teak pieces for outdoor use bought over the past dozen years; some used and some new.

The tables are as attractive as they looked online. I was surprised by how beautifully they were engineered, with solid simple joinery, kind of like you would see in an old barn. These tables are equal to the quality of the very high- end designer teak that I have bought used ( and could never afford new). I am super-pleased. Customer sevice was great... there was a small snafu with delivery, and it was immediately resolved with a phone call.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words.

name: Linda Marotta
text: What a Great experience!!  I was nervous & hesitant about buying a dining table on line. I read the other 5 star reviews & felt comfortable with my decision to purchase from Chic Teak!.  My dining table is a  stunning piece of art.  It arrived within a couple of days, friendly delivery service, table was packaged to perfection.  Customer service was exceptional & prompt--this is something that is extremely important & will certainly make my decision very simple to purchase again from Chic Teak! I definitely made the right decision both with the table choice & company! I do real estate in S Jersey & Naples Florida & will definitely refer people to the company's website!

resp.text: Thanks Linda!

name: Dino Fritz
text: We got the teak root table and side table and they look amazing. The glass broke during delivery but Clint made sure that a new one was on its way the next day. I was surprised at how fast the replacement came. Great customer service and beautiful tables. Thanks again!

resp.text: Thanks Dino!

name: Holly Kirk
text: Fast Shipping!  Good service!  High quality products! We bought a heavy duty umbrella! I called with questions and they were able to answer all of them.  The umbrella does what it is supposed to do! Several people have seen ours and want one. I would recommend it to anyone. Very high quality and substantial. Provides a lot of shade. It is perfect for our 8 foot patio table.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words Holly, please visit us again.

name: K. E. Vaughn
text: We recently purchased a home in Pensacola and needed some “special” chairs for our back patio. I found the one I wanted however, it cost $2000. Since that was a little too much for me, I kept searching until I found the Barcelona chair at Chic Teak!  I was a little hesitant because I was not familiar with the company but I took the risk. The chairs arrived timely and aside from a small quality issue, I fell in love with them!  The company followed up regarding our chairs and I told them about the small issue and he offered a solution. We had another issue in the next day or two and I notified the company - they immediately sent a replacement. I have been blown away by their customer service and I’m a VERY happy customer at this point. Instead of one chair at $2000, I have four. That’s exactly what I needed. I will definitely purchase additional items from them.

resp.text: Glad to see we could make you happy, thank you for your business!

name: Matthew Vanderjagt
text: Couldn’t be more satisfied with my Santa Barbara 3 piece chic teak table and chair set. Not only is it beautiful, but it arrived quick and was packaged very well. They cherry on top was that Chic Teak was simply an absolute pleasure to deal with. They followed up with my purchase and answered all my questions and emails very quickly! Their customer service is grade A just as their products are!

resp.text: Thanks Matt, let us know if we can be of any further help.

name: Cathy Wilson
text: I was looking for unique furniture for my new move. I stumbled upon Chic Teak. WOW! So glad I did. Never in my life have I seen such  beautiful, hand-crafted pieces of furniture ART.  I have ordered a few pieces from the Marina Del Rey Collection and each one arrived more beautiful than the pictures. The pictures do not do them justice.  I ordered the chest media center with 4 doors and raised shelf made from recycled teak wood boats. I had also ordered the Semco teak wood sealer at that time. Within minutes of ordering, I received a phone call from Chic Teak. They asked if I had any other teak furniture. I did not. They informed me that this piece does not require the sealer and that they would be crediting my account. That was the first example of their exemplary customer service that I rate a TEN out of five.  They could have made that extra money but their honestly and commitment to customer service wouldn’t allow that. When the piece arrived (FREE freight) we could not believe how absolutely beautiful it was!!! Such high quality, beautiful craftsmanship, it’s functional ART WORK!!! So, of course I had to order another couple pieces. They are so beautiful and heavy. The colors are so deep and beautiful I find myself just sitting in a room looking at the pieces and all the beautiful colors. Everyone who has seen them fall in love!!!  On my third delivery, one of the pieces had been damaged during shipment. I sent Chic Teak an  email with pictures  and they made it right that very same day. Unbelievably excellent customer service. I have honestly never dealt with any company that has better customer service than Chic Teak. Therefore I have to say that the company as a whole deserve a rating of TEN out of five. They are heads above the rest!  They have another customer for life!!! Keep up the GREAT work Chic Teak!

resp.text: Wow, thank you very much for all those nice words.

name: Becky Hinkle
text: I have ordered outdoor furniture twice from Chic Teak.  Their customer service is phenomenal.  Very helpful and courteous. I purchased the furniture for a vacation rental home.  It is very sturdy and has held up well with lots of use.  Their delivery was very quick and delivery people bent over backwards to please.  I will continue to use them in the future for my outdoor furniture needs.  You will not be disappointed!

resp.text: Thanks Becky.

name: Nancy White
text: I can’t express enough how wonderful my whole experience was with Chic Teak. From the Customer service to the delivery  was just outstanding. Now for the prices  of furniture  I purchased ... I bought the teak boat console with eight drawers and the side table from the Marina Del Rey  collection. These are like pieces of art. The character and quality are beyond words. These are solid very well constructed pieces. Not your thrown together on an assembly line furniture. It was by far my best experience of purchasing anything online or even at a furniture store. And I have done both on many occasions over the years. I wish there was the ability to post pics of the pieces so you could see . If I could rate Chic Teak 100 stars I would.  This place is a hidden gem for sure and I’m. Looking forward to when I can purchase more pieces from them. If your still hesitant on a purchase, reach out to them, they respond quick and are so accommodating to answer questions, they are friendly and just a pure pleasure to communicate with.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words.

name: Kim Wagner
text: We ordered a bench from Chic Teak and it is lovely and a good value.  They have stood behind their merchandise.

resp.text: Thanks Kim.

name: Wellington Goddin (welly)
text: Love, love the teak root dining table.  I have had lots of compliments.  Looks even better than the online pictures.  I ordered it online on a Friday and it was delivered Wednesday.

name: Nika M.
text: Beautiful unique furniture, exceptional customer service, and fast delivery! Don’t hesitate to order from Chick teak.

resp.text: Thanks Nika!

name: Billy Fritz
text: Chic Teak provided a pleasurable shopping experience for us on line.  They were no delays or excuses and provided a quality product.  It was delivered on time and kept us totally informed during whole process.   It completed our outdoor kitchen furniture with a classy look.

resp.text: Thanks Billy, hope to serve you again.

name: Greg & Cindy Moreno
text: I searched all over everywhere for a teak root bar height table.  I couldn't find one anywhere.  Then I lucked out and found Chic Teak!!  They had EXACTLY what I wanted for a very reasonable price.  They shipped right away and the whole experience was WONDERFUL!!!  I highly recommend them!!

name: Rob H
text: Awesome products and great prices make for a winning combination. I love this company and their dedication to their customers! Buy with confidence!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words.

name: Chuck Hawley
text: These are much nicer than the "patio store" teak chairs which last for about two years in the seaside environment. Much more sculpted and heavier construction, they look like they will last 5 or more years with some care. I ordered four and should have ordered six. My one complaint is they polystyrene packaging materials which are a mess and not easily recycled. I wrote the owner and he immediately said they were looking into alternatives. Good work!

name: Daniel Sileo
text: We got the 13' Sun Garden umbrella.  When it arrived it was missing a major piece.  I called the store and Clint was very helpful in making sure I had not missed it in the packing material.  Once we determined that is was missing, he was all over getting us the piece we needed to set it up.  Since he is a distributor, he didn't have the piece in hand but worked with the parent company and had it to us in less than a week!  We would all like everything to be perfect but if you have an issue, be assured Clint will make it right.  Great service, communication and we love the umbrella!

resp.text: Thanks Daniel!

name: Dave S
text:
I bought a 13 foot Sun Garden umbrella from Chic Teak which was shipped to me in North Carolina. Unfortunately the umbrella was damaged during shipment. Chic Teak immediately resolved the problem. Awesome customer service which you don't find so often anymore.
BTW we love the umbrella.

name: Phid Lawless
text: Chic Teak has provided us with the best customer service we have ever received while shopping online. Fast, thoughtful, polite, and they truly stand behind their products. We are very, very impressed.

resp.text: Thank you.

name: Helen Woods
text: The quality of the furniture is excellent.  The customer service is superb. They called to check on an order I made ....just to make sure I didn’t make a mistake!   One item I received had minor damage and they worked with me (pleasantly) to make it right.  I’m a VERY satisfied customer.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words.

name: Karla Thompson
text: Wonderful experience and could not be happier with the final product.  I ordered a Chic Teak round woven coffee table with glass top.  Communication was easy from my initial phone order, coordinating delivery time, to actual delivery.  The table arrived in solid packaging.  The table is beautiful; great texture, color, thick glass top, and braiding.  I am happy to recommend Chic Teak!

resp.text: Thanks Karla, come back and see us!

name: Robert Walters
text: Wow! Clint and his team were fantastic. We had a a couple minor hiccups, but Clint was prompt with addressing and solving. Would absoutely reccomened their products to everyone. Great quality piece and even better customer service.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words Robert.

name: H Young
text: Excellent packing, although I wish it something recyclable and not styrofoam. Quality is excellent, although I had a problem with the assembly of one of the chairs (for which I have received an email and a phone call offering assistance), but was easy to correct. The rest of the chairs assemble in less than 5 minutes each. Haven't gotten to the table yet but the chairs are beautiful and well put together. I would certainly buy again.

name: M. B.
text: The Chic Teak customer service team went above and beyond to ensure we were happy with our purchase.  Chic Teak has a customer for life.

resp.text: Thank you so much!

name: Randy Saiani
text: We purchased the Teak Wood Louvre Cabinet with 3 Doors & 3 Drawers and are extremely pleased with the  cabinet. It is very well constructed, solid, heavy and beautiful. The product is exactly like the description and pictures. Even more attractive in person ! Chic Teak was very helpful with questions and assistance. We  highly recommend the company and their products.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind reply!

name: Astrid Meysing
text: We ordered a beautiful bench and amazing swing from Chic Teak. Their customer service is outstanding and we couldn’t be happier! Would give them 20 stars!

resp.text: WOW 20 stars, thanks!

name: Phillip Sloop
text: The two teak benches I ordered from Chic Teak arrived within the week and look great!  They appear very sturdy and go very well with our existing outdoor teak dining table.

resp.text: Thanks Phillip!

name: Frank Douwes
text:
After many searches, both local and online, I was happy to find the dining chairs in the style and dimensions I needed.
The detailed descriptions were flawless. Contact replies came fast and to the point.
Follow-up phone call after I placed the order was professional and relayed genuine appreciation for the business.
I highly recommend Chic Teak to anyone looking for quality products and excellent service.

resp.text: Thanks Frank, let us know if we can be of any further assistance.

name: Mike Stone
text: I have purchased many pieces from Chic Teak and have always been impressed with the quality of the teak.  My recent purchase was beginning to get uncomfortable as the local delivery agent was not very accommodating.  One quick e mail to Chic Teak and my issue was quickly resolved.  I knew the products were good, now I know the after sales service is also equally good.  Well done Chic Teak and thank you.

resp.text: Thanks Mike!

name: Barbara Pearson
text: We just purchased a Teak Wood Root Dining Table with a 48 inch glass top from Chic Teak. I have always loved Teak Wood. This Teak Root is beautiful and heavy. It fits perfectly in my kitchen. The first glass top had a small chip in it, how it got there, I don't know. What I do know is that, they sent me a replacement in less than a week and the replacement cost me nothing.  They guarantee 100 percent satisfaction. I found Chic Teak on Amazon.

resp.text: Thank Barbara!

name: Kendall Jones
text: We upgraded from a powder coated oval metal table and chairs to the 59” round table with the triple peanut bench and 4 orleans chairs. This is so much better than the hot metal table we’ve had for several years. We always had to put towels down for the little ones to sit at that table. I originally didn’t buy the cushions to go with the bench and chairs but I ordered them after the delivery.  I am not a huge fan of white/cream fabric with grandkids around but I love the cushions.  This will be much more comfortable to gather around after swimming.  We enjoyed an outdoor Mother’s Day lunch at the table, bench and chairs last weekend. Thanks Chic Teak!

resp.text: Thanks Kendall!

name: Thomas Wiscombe
text: The shipping was excellent. I am very proud of all the teak furniture that we have purchased from Chic Teak. Everything will last several lifetimes and can be passed down to my children. The 4 stools I purchased were a match to the 3 we had bought 15 years ago and they match beautifully.

resp.text: Thanks Thomas.

name: AA W
text:
Doing Business with the Customer Truly in Mind.
Chick Teak was having a sale at one of their stores.  I stumbled upon their site on Google while searching for a table and found the most beautiful Brazil Unique Slab Coffee Table.  I was in the process of purchasing a new home and knew I could not receive it for a couple of months.  I emailed Clint and told him I really wanted the table but could not have it shipped for a while.  He said no problem, they would ship it when I was ready.  I sent Clint an email and told him I was ready for my table and it was shipped the same day.  They sent me an email followed by a phone call to let me know my table was on its way.

The table is absolutely beautiful!  A high-quality handmade table.  This company does not mass produce furniture, they take pride into putting labor into their work.  They take extra care into ensuring their customer is happy with their purchase.  They don’t just forget you after the sale.  If you have any questions, they are happy to assist.  Chick Teak is a rare company today.  I enjoyed doing business with them and will continue to do business with them whenever I am looking for a product they sell.

Outstanding Company!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words. Just to explain, we closed our retail location in Alabama to focus on online sales. Chic Teak is NOT going out of business and is thriving.

name: Becky W
text: We stumbled on to Chic Teak in a google search looking for Live Edge Tables.  They had many beautiful pieces to choose from. I called the store and spoke with an employee (on a Saturday). After our talk I ordered the table and matching bench through their website. The order arrived in Seattle a week after ordering. The 500 pound shipment arrived in pristine condition. Beautiful table and bench.  The furniture is amazing, but it is their customer service that carried the day. They called and emailed me throughout the entire process. We even had a discussion on how to take care of this amazing wood furniture.  Their carrier was also excellent on customer service. They make a good team. I am going to order more furniture from them and I have told a dozen friends of their excellent service with incredible art like furniture.  We have been dealing with problems from the big box stores - its nice to know that the smaller retailers still know how to take care of customers. Keep up the great work.

resp.text: Hi Becky thank you for your kind words!

name: Cheryl Mojzis
text: I recently ordered 2 chairs along w the ottoman and within a wk or so one on the ottomans cracked. I immediately contacted the store and quickly received a response within an hr on how we could resolve this issue. To make a long story short it was fully repaired and I am pleased not only w the set but the customer service. I am very huge on customer service and this company delivered. Thank you Clint for your speedy response and professionalism. I would recommend this co. the furniture is beautiful and goes nicely in my room.

resp.text: Thanks Cheryl!

name: Kim Prins
text: We researched teak furniture for months before ordering from Chic Teak and still it exceeded our expectations. Fast shipping. Arrived in pristine condition- can’t say the same for other more brands we tried through popular national retailers. Easy to install. Quality product for great price point! We use the tables and chairs commercially for our restaurant deck and used the chairs all winter long inside with a wood fire under dry conditions with no issues! We have bought more we were so pleased with the quality. We get lots of compliments on our Chic Teak table and chairs. We would highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words.

name: Rhiannon Fernandes
text: I placed an online order from Chic Teak and am so pleased with the whole experience!  First, the product is perfect.  It looks beautiful and the craftsmanship is fantastic, my family and friends are already enjoying the new table and chairs set and I’m confident it will withstand the elements.  I was nervous ordering such a big purchase online but I’m really happy with the quality of the products.  The customer service, though, is what really set this experience apart.  From order through delivery there was prompt communication and when delivery hit a snag (as it sometimes does because I live in a remote area), Chic Teak was so accommodating and really went out of their way to ensure that my furniture arrived on time and in mint condition.  I wouldn’t hesitate to purchase again from this company!

resp.text: Thanks Rhiannon!

name: Mechael Cain
text:
Gorgeous furniture! I purchased a media cabinet, and loved it so much that I basically furnished my dining room and a bedroom. The quality is amazing. Every piece is unique. The customer service is outstanding.
Love this company!!!

resp.text: Thanks Mechael, come see us again.

name: Beth Steele
text: We recently purchased a teak trolley bar cart from La Place. Their products are familiar to us because we bought a tall table with high bar-type chairs to use as our kitchen furniture a few years ago. That set proved so sturdy and beautiful that we had no doubt that the trolley bar cart would be a great choice.  The  barware, glassware, and even some of the bottles have places "carved" out for them. The effect is classy. Thank you.

resp.text: Thanks Beth!

name: Layna Beer
text: Our table is just beautiful! We will be ordering another one for our entry way. Chic Teak is great to work with and they get their product out within days instead of weeks!!

resp.text: Thanks Layna!

name: Sue Ritchie
text: Saw this beautiful bar height table and chairs set online and went directly to the manufacturer to order - once we received, it is even better than the photos!  Ordering process was easy, with immediate follow ups by their customer service team.  Delivery was fast, and everything was simple and easy to assemble, the quality of the craftsmanship is excellent!  We are very pleased and highly recommend!

resp.text: Thanks Sue, please visit us again.

name: David Worthington
text:
On 10/28/2011 I bought a set of high bar table and 4 chairs from LaPlace Interiors in Foley AL. I run a bed and breakfast and since 1996 on my open back deck I had tried any and all kinds of outdoor furniture from commercial plastics to rough iron and everything in between. It is an open deck that gets full sun, rain and all the elements that nature can throw at it. Nothing had ever lasted more than 2-3 years. So 10 years ago when I paid them $2357 I thought I was nuts but was willing to give it a try as I had noticed a lot of restaurants using it for their outdoor furniture and it appeared to weather it all!

I am delighted to say that it is still in perfect condition, sturdy and beautiful 10 years later! I get many compliments on it and have sent people your way. When you do the math the Chic Teak is cheaper than anything else out there on the market today. Even these new pvc wicker items would never last 10 years and counting, especially in the rain and sun, but your products take a lickin and keep on tickin!!!!

Even the cushions still look great and other than the black trim fading. I regularly pull them in when it rains but occasionally they get soaked. My husband had the bright idea to put them in the washer on the spin cycle, good idea in theory, however the washing machine ate 2 of the 4.

I was thrilled to see that even though the store was long since closed I was able to find you online and replace them!

So glad your still in business! And you should be as this is one of those rare quality products that last a lifetime. And in today's world that is really, REALLY saying something!

Any and ALL outdoor furniture purchases in the future will always be from your company and I am one of your biggest fans!

resp.text: Thanks again David!

name: Sandy Russell
text: My bar stools are beautiful. I love the colors. Very sturdy.

resp.text: Great to see, thank you!

name: Paul Hurst
text: What A Great Find! Living on the Gulf Coast with all kind of boats for the last three decades, we've seen lots of Teak Work and this stuff is Awesome! The finish and joinery is absolutely beautiful, especially for these prices. We completely intend to add more pieces to our collection

resp.text: Thanks Paul, please feel free to visit us again.

name: Empirical Wizard
text: The Chic Teak Steamer Chair is excellent.  Place it in the late afternoon Sun, casting a long shadow, pour yourself a stiff charge of fine southern sippin' whiskey, backed by a Habana Partagas Serie D No. 4, and today's Wall Street Journal, and it will be hard to get out of the chair when you are finally done.

resp.text: That's funny, thank you for your review!

name: K S
text: Everything went very well with the ordering, delivery, customer service, etc...one thing, this beauty's (louvered cabinet) over 300lbs so have some muscle handy when it arrives ! The quality and appearance, A++ . Thank you Chic Teak. Cheers.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words.

name: Greg Horne
text: The backless benches we recently purchased from Chic Teak are absolutely the best teak furniture we have found at any price.  With today's heightened concern about the depletion of the rainforest, it's hard to find sustainably-sourced teak anywhere, and so much of what can be found is of lesser quality.  Chic Teak's products are made from the very highest quality wood, are perfectly crafted and finished, and are beautiful to look at.  The packaging was also very sturdy: each of our benches was shipped in a heavyweight cardboard container, inside another heavyweight cardboard container, and all secured on a pallet, so that they arrived in perfect condition.  A great product and company!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words Greg.

name: Bridgett N
text: The outstanding customer service is what makes Chic Teak great! We received our first Chic Teak entryway table broken in pieces and they took the problem into their own hands, upgraded the shipping containers, and then provided us with a second non-broken entryway table. I am so happy we gave them our business and a second chance to get us a non-broken table. Their products are better than pictured. Truly statement one-of-kind home decor that could easily classify as artwork! Thank you Chic Teak for the beautiful entryway table that will be a talking piece of our home for years to come! Can’t wait until our next purchase from y’all!

name: Benjamin Craft
text:
Chic Teak is a very unique and rare find for quality furniture. We purchased a large dining room table and a set of chairs. We were so pleased with the quality and style of these items that we made another purchase of a buffet that matched our table.
We will enjoy these items for years to come!
Ben C

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words.

name: Bob Maddox
text: I found Chic Teak through a google search.  I was looking for a pretty specific piece for a boat... tall, small round all teak table with matching bar stools, and they had it. Price was so low that I was worried about quality, but was very happy when it all arrived.  Chic helped me coordinate a drop off to a Tacoma marina that needed to be timed for an exact date that we would be there... and it worked!  All pieces were in perfect condition when I unpacked (all on a pallet, and the shipping was free...).  Highly recommend these guys.

resp.text: Thanks for the reply Bob.

name: T G
text: Beautiful Teak Coffee Table: It looks gorgeous on our white rug! Excellent Customer Service: Checked in with me by phone prior to shipment and after shipment to ensure all was well with the table-- who does that? Chic Teak did!! Amazing Price: This beautiful coffee table was so well priced! Thank you Chic Teak!!

name: Anthony Tilley
text: Big selection web site

name: Rob Ward
text: We love our new Chic Teak furniture. It is great quality and was easy to assemble. I appreciated the follow up calls and emails after purchase! They made it very easy and I would definitely order from them again.

name: Yvonne Torres
text: Beautiful piece of art. Love It! So glad we chose this for out coffee table. Came in a wood  crate, full protected.  Very happy.

name: Lindsay Ballew
text: This company has exceptional customer service and their furniture is beautiful. I would highly recommend them!

resp.text: Thanks Lindsay, come see us again!

name: Janise Witt
text: I love our teak wood root table.  The people at Chic Teak were very helpful and were willing to work with me to hold my table until we were able to move to our new home.  They also helped to assure that we received the table on the day we requested.  It was very well packaged as well.

resp.text: Thanks Janise!

name: BRB S
text:
Wonderful furniture!

The quality of this furniture is exceptional. It is sturdy and so very comfortable. The wood is beautiful. And it is so nice to know teak will hold up for years.

name: Dianne Fabrocini
text: Absolutely stunning, well-made and just simply beautiful and unusual products. Customer service was outstanding and couldn’t have been more courteous and helpful. I have gone back and  purchased several  additional items.  I highly recommend Chic Teak!!

resp.text: Thanks Dianne!

name: Elaine Smyth
text: Excellent product and customer service.  Although we had an unusual problem with the table which we ordered we contacted customer service and they sent a replacement table the same day.

resp.text: At your service Elaine, thanks for shopping with us, satisfaction guaranteed!

name: C. S.
text: Unique and high quality furniture at great prices.  The customer service is also outstanding.  My family and I have purchased a number of indoor and outdoor furniture pieces from Chic Teak and are very happy with all of them.  I'm sitting on one of their comfy chairs as I write this!

resp.text: Thank you for your nice review.

name: pat pat
text: Love my teak table. Very unique and beautiful craftsmanship! Customer service was amazing and fast shipping! They even kept in contact after the purchase!

resp.text: Thanks Pat!

name: Georgeanne Sweat
text: Do NOT buy!  I made the mistake of purchasing a table and 4 chairs 3 months ago.  They looked great for 2 months then began cracking and had mildew.  I contacted the company and was told this was "normal" and I should spray with water/bleach.  I did and now a month later they are covered again with mildew.  Which is disgusting. Who want to eat on a moldy table? I asked for a refund or a store credit and was told NO.  This company does NOT stand behind its product. They do NOT care. They now say I should have sealed it.  This has never been mentioned before.  Bottom line, DO NOT spend $2000 like I did and have to clean, clean, seal and clean again. Who wants that maintenance????

resp.text:
We're sorry to see that you are not satisfied with the items you purchased.
Periodical cleaning is part of having furniture out in the elements.
We did not say that you should have sealed it, this is per preference of the customer.
After you contacted us, we suggested to use a sealer since this will help with cleaning the furniture.
We stand 100% behind our products but we unfortunately don't control the environment the furniture is placed in.

name: Kelly Casterline
text: We  couldn't have been more pleased with the quality and beauty of this furniture as well as the exceptional customer service.    Don't go anywhere else online... You have found the company to work with!  Thank you Clint for going above and beyond!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words.

name: Shelley Powers
text: The folks at chicteak are wonderful to work with. We had a specific need for our table and they helped us get the perfect table in their inventory long distance. When the shipping company told us we weren’t as important as their commercial shipments, chicteak stepped in and got our table delivered the next day so we had a place for our visiting family to eat dinner.  We love our table too! It’s exactly what we were looking for.

resp.text: Thanks Shelley, as you experienced, we try as hard as we can to satisfy our customers!

name: Maryalice Kimel
text: What a wonderful table!! Thrilled with the colors, weight and craftsmanship. I bought the table on line, which can be scary, but it was exactly as the pictures indicated. Also, working with Chic Teak customer service was like asking a family member for a favor. I needed to delay my shipment due to being out of town and when I called it was as though they already knew me and were very accommodating saying, “ Yes, we just packed your table and are holding it in the warehouse.” When I did call back for the delivery they immediately said, “Sure, we’ll get that right out” and I had my table in 2 days. This was the best experience I have EVER had with an online company and living on an island means almost everything we buy is online. I highly recommend Chic Teak to family and friends who need outdoor furniture or just something special indoors. You cannot go wrong ordering from this wonderful company.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words. Hope to hear from you again!

name: inkasempiretours
text: Should be 6 stars. First, let me say that the customer service is unbelievably excellent. After looking at what other teak-furniture companies offer, I concluded that Chic Teak has the best designs. I purchased a large number of West Palm chairs and Florence bistro tables for an ecolodge in Puerto Rico and was pleased with the quality of the packing that had to survive a truck and boat journey. I was also pleased with the quality of the craftsmanship. This company has found some outstanding artisans in Indonesia, who make the furniture for them. Overall, it was a great experience..

name: Mike Kilmer
text: I love these people. We are blessed to have an old set of four of their ingeniously simple folding chairs. One of them had a broken dowel where the legs connect. I called the company. Clint, the manager, had me send a picture of the chair. He want into their archives, found two possible matches and mailed both to us for free. Now that's Chic!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words.

name: robert samson
text: I have been looking for teak table and chairs for a long time and finally found it at Chic Teak.All people who I talked with were great.No question was left unanswered, everything I needed to know about my purchase was explained in detail and complete.Coady,Clint andWarren were all patient and polite which made the experience most pleasant

resp.text: Thanks Robert.

name: Mike Keltz
text:
I ordered a matching chair to a tall table set online and was expecting it to be delivered freight from Mobile.

Great surprise when the Mobile store called and stated that the Destin store actually had it on hand. If I picked it up there, I’d save the shipping costs.

Went to the Destin store and the folks were just plain helpful and genuinely good people to deal with. I highly recommend to anyone if they need good-looking and long-lasting outdoor furniture, head over to La Place USA Furniture Outlet in Foley or Destin

resp.text: Thanks Mike, great to see we had you covered.

name: Rod S
text: Just purchased a teakwood slab bar table and it arrived a few days ago.  I could not be happier with the experience.  I found it online while looking for a unique centerpiece for a room in our house and was a little nervous buying site unseen from another state.  I called the store and they emailed us several pictures of the actual table and assured me there would be no issues with returns if I was not satisfied.  It arrived 2 days after purchased very well packaged and the store even followed up to make sure it arrived unscathed.  I highly recommend Chic Teak based on our experience with this purchase.  BTW - the product was worth every penny and absolutely gorgeous!

name: Dona Insley
text: Really was nice to receive a phone call when the coffee table was shipped and the details. Was packed/crated really well, and in fine condition. It is an outstanding piece of fine furniture.OUTSTANDING  is the only word to describe it. A big ten for you guys. Just  stand there in awe of this  coffee table. Thanks again, Buddy Insley Mardela Springs Md.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words.

name: Jennifer Masters
text: Amazing experience dealing with this company. Top of the line teak furniture and fantastic customer service. Dealing with them has been a pleasure.

name: John Bradford
text: Great furniture!! Very well built and will last a life time.

name: Barry Hunter
text: Beautifully constructed, well made, sturdy. Chic Teak A++ personal service.

resp.text: Thanks Barry, hope to hear soon from you again.

name: Angel Triana
text:
I sent the following email to the company after receiving a Suar wood table that I ordered from them. (This table was not yet on their website, as it was still in transit from Indonesia. They set up a payment page just for me, so that i could purchase it.) Email follows:

The table arrived. Beyond expectations!
No splitting, warping, spalting, or sawing chips out of surface! Minimal filled areas, good finish, with almost no trapped particles or scratches. End grains smooth and well finished. Amazing piece, thank you!

I was very happy with their communication, and the table shipped before the projected time, was well packaged, and arrived intact. The price was a very good value in comparison to similar tables I had seen online. I would not hesitate to do business with ChicTeak again, you will be very happy if you choose to buy from them.

Angel Triana

resp.text: Thanks Angel!

name: Janet Kelley
text: I love the furniture. My family has purchased so many nice items over the last several years and we were very pleased until my last purchase. After paying the cashier [manager] for my table a young man with no shirt on came out from the back stock room with my table on a cart, pushed to me and turned around went back into the stock room. I looked at the cashier and said well I guess he wants me to load it myself. She just smiled. As I pushed the table to the door a customer coming in opened the door for me and said do they make you load your own furniture here. I responded yes it looks like it. The manager was coming to wait on the man as he opended the door for me and heard his remark but never responded. That was the last time I shopped there.

resp.text: Hi Janet, I'm sorry to see you had a bad experience at one of our stores, because we honestly try our best but also make mistakes. Would you mind sharing at which location this happened so we can address this issue. Thanks again for being a loyal customer though.

name: Johan Huwaert
text: Thank you for the excellent quality and service

resp.text: Thanks Johan!

name: Julie Trevarthen
text: Good selection.  Shannon went out of her way to make sure I got the chair I wanted.  Prices are better than other places we looked.  Will definitely use them again.

resp.text: Julie, we appreciate your business and thank you for the kind review.  We look forward to working with you in the future.

name: Hamp Repper
text: Can’t go wrong buying here! Great selection, quality & prices.

resp.text: Hamp, thanks for the great review.  We appreciate it.

name: Lavonda Poe
text: I love high point furniture. They have beautiful pieces. There staff is so helpful and kind. I recommend this store to everyone. I give it a 10. Love you guys.

resp.text: Lavonda, we have always enjoyed dealing with you and Charles and cherish the friendship it grew into.  I hope you are doing well.  Thanks, Reggie

text: I don't recommend this store. The quality of the furniture I got from there was very low graded.  The people that they use to deliver the furniture a background check should be done on them. The young man managing the store at the time was a really good person.

name: Rachel Kidd
text: A little disappointed that our living room furniture ordered in August has not come in! Thank you COVID-19!

resp.text: Carol thank you for the lovely review and we hope to see you again soon!

text: We needed help to purchase just the right sofa for our mom.  They were so helpful. The transaction was easy and the piece was delivered right on schedule.  We loved it and so did Mom!

name: laurie dunford
text: High Point Furniture has a beautiful showroom and a great selection in a range of price points. Reggie was so easy and great to work with! He was able to work with me a lot through text which made it so much easier for me to finalize the order and coordinate all the details. The delivery and set up went great also!

resp.text: Thank you Laurie for the kind review.  We really appreciate your business.  Let us know if you need anything else.

name: Sheila Blackwood
text: High Point Furniture is a great place to find beautiful furniture and decor.  The staff is so helpful and friendly!  They help you find unusual decorations to make your home beautiful and unique.

text: Great selection of furniture and even better people! We loved our experience each team we made a trip. They gave great recommendations!

text: I could not have been happier with my visit to High Point.  A lot of the furniture today is cheaply made or the high end furniture is so expensive.  I picked out a quality made sofa for a very fair price.  The people could not have been more helpful and courteous.  So worth the drive to Jasper.  My future furniture store.

resp.text: Thank you Lanie for kind review.  We enjoyed working with you and hope to see you again soon.

text: We love our leather reclining sofa from High Point. The staff and owner worked with us to get exactly what we wanted  it was delivered when promised and it’s absolutely beautiful. We highly recommend High Point!

name: Julie Ryland
text: I really appreciated the personal attention I received from my sales woman. She really listened to my likes and dislikes and steered me in the direction of furnishings that appealed to my taste. Prices were in line, and the delivery process was a breeze.

resp.text: Thank you for business and kind comments.  We enjoyed doing business with you.

text: Best furniture I’ve ever dealt with. Not a chain store, owned by a really great family, quality service and high quality furniture. My go to from here on when purchasing furniture

resp.text: Scott, thanks for the review.  We have always enjoyed working with you.  If we can help in the future please let us know.

name: Sharon Lofstad
text: Friendly staff.  Delivery guys are superb.Very professional. Great service, great selection.  What more can u ask for?

text: Nice and friendly!  They kept  me updated on delivery. Easy to work with.

text:
Very helpful salespeople. We have bought most of our furniture from here and more than likely we will be back!

And they Deliver!

resp.text: Winn I appreciate your business and thanks for the review.

name: Jama Hoffman
text: I emailed the store about what I was looking for, got Reggie, who promptly emailed me back with pictures and prices of things I might like. When I came to the store, unannounced, he took his time with my husband and I, showing us what we told him we were interested in finding for our new home. I never felt pressured. I ended up buying a sectional and 4 barstools from him and he surprised me by delivering the stools a day early, with fabric samples for outdoor furniture I was wanting to purchase, but thought I would have to make the hour drive over and back to look at samples. He sent the ones I mentioned to him in an email with the delivery men so I could match them to my current color scheme and  then call and order it over the phone. They have given me exemplary customer service, the best prices of anyone I have shopped with and have earned my business for all the other needs I have for this retirement home. My daughter was the one who referred me to them, having received the same treatment when she purchased a new sofa for her home. They are the best!

name: Anne Glasgow
text: Great business! Friendly and caring sales people and super quality merchandise! Will shop Highpoint with all my furniture needs.

resp.text: Anne, we really appreciate your business and hope to help you out in the future.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind review.  We really appreciate it.

text: Reggie is always so helpful! The furniture is beautiful and we've been happy with every purchase

text: I'm normally don't do reviews for businesses, but High Point Furniture has been a favorite of my family for years. They just recently picked up Lay Z Boy, so I feel a purchase coming up in the near future for me!!

name: Kim Calvert
text: The owner Mr. Watts went way out of his way to make sure we found the perfect piece for our home! They had a tremendous selection and everything is beautiful! Our furniture was delivered the same day by two of the most polite young men I have ever met, they also did a fantastic job of setting everything up like I wanted! The entire experience was great and I would recommend High Point Furniture to everyone!

text: I know this is a higher end store but they are absolutely over priced

resp.text: Would you be kind enough to let us know why you think we are overpriced?

name: Jason Farley
text: My wife and I came to High Point Furniture with a specific need. They were extremely helpful in finding us the perfect piece for our home. We left very satisfied and glad to not see the entire store in an attempt to push other furniture. We will definitely visit again.

name: GoTracieWin
text: After our home was flooded, we were in the market for a bedroom suite to replace my daughter's damaged one.  We went to every furniture store within driving distance, but finally found exactly what we wanted right here in Jasper!  Mr. Watts, Dean, & the entire staff @ High Point were so professional, helping us to find just what we needed, without being "pushy".  We purchased beautiful, high-quality furniture for half the price of the other stores.  The young delivery men were quick & skillful in bringing in & setting up our pieces. I cannot recommend this business highly enough.  Very pleased.

name: Patrick Johnson
text: I just recently had a GREAT experience shopping at High Point Furniture in Jasper.  Very large selection of extremely nicer quality furniture to choose from.  A guy named Reggie Watts helped me and was very professional and attentive to our furniture needs.

name: Roderick Money
text: Really good people awesome service... And Lora is the best

name: Angie Long
text: Our bedroom, dining and living room furniture came from High Point Furniture and we couldn’t be happier.  Highly recommend shopping here.

resp.text: Angie we appreciate your business through the years and hope to serve you in the future.

name: Clint McLain
text: Always professional! Great quality! Great value! And on time!

resp.text: Thank you Clint.  I appreciate the business through the years.

name: Dustin Myhand
text: Reggie and his staff at High Point Furniture are first class all the way!  We've bought several pieces from High Point and have never had anything less than a fantastic experience.  The sales staff are knowledge and don't pressure you.  The delivery and set up has always gone off without a hitch.  The quality of the items at High Point is WAY higher than the prices!  We've shopped many places of supposedly comparable quality, here in town and elsewhere and have not found anyone who can compete with High Point from a quality, customer service, ease of doing business and price standpoint.  In today's world of online shopping and the absence of relationship building while doing business, Reggie and the folks at High Point are a breath of fresh air!

name: Archie Burgess

resp.text: Thanks Archie you are the best

You gave 8 of them a 1-star, but 1 business was lucky enough to earn a 2-star rating from you.  Sounds to me like the businesses may not be the problem.

resp.text:
Thank you for your business and kind words!  Please come back again soon!!
Ralph Holley

name: Jacqueline Bryant
text: My husband and I decided to try this place out because of their big sale going on. Our shopping experience was great but as soon as we paid them it went down hill from there. We originally went to just get a new mattress set and decided to go ahead and purchase a sectional as well. They said they had to order the mattress and would deliver it all after the weekend which was no problem. Delivery day comes and I’m 100% sure 1 of the delivery drivers was on drugs as he kept making weird noises and just biting air..... They bring everything in and get it set up and I ask where the 3rd piece of my sectional was and get told oh there’s no third piece it’s a typo ect. Well a week later they call to tell me they found my 3rd piece of my sectional which I then had to drive to pickup myself and install myself once home (for the amount we paid for the sectional I wasn’t happy) Then to top it off our mattress didn’t feel right from day one. It was hard as a rock and killing my back worse than it already is. (We were purchasing a new mattress for that reason!) Well I finally get my husband to move The mattress Around and realize IT’S NOT THE RIGHT ONE. We paid A LOT for the mattress and needless to say I expected the right one to be delivered! They did get my correct mattress to me finally after almost a week and offered to give me store credit or refunded me some of my money. I tried to purchase other furniture pieces with the credit but he was pricing the items way higher then the advertised price so I finally just requested a refund which they did with a POST DATED check! So, needless to say I was worried the funds would even be in the bank. I then find out the owner not only knew that my mattress was wrong but told his employees to give me what they had in the back and not order the correct one! They did that the day I bought it bc after getting everything done my sales lady said oh it will have a different cover on it bc they changed it so don’t be alarmed 🤦🏻‍♀️ (the correct mattress they finally delivered looks exactly the same as the one in the show room. So no they didn’t change it)  So they knew before I walked out of the store the day I purchased that they weren’t going to send my correct furniture that they were going to send me what they had in the back regardless of what it paid for and hope I didn’t notice. Needless to say I will not be back PERIOD. None of my delivery was correct at all because they didn’t want to order what I needed but had no problem taking over 5k from me.

name: DoubleSword Productions
text: Holley's has nice furniture but their items are very expensive.  I've been to other places and they are anywhere from $200-$500 cheaper.  A plus is they have free delivery.  Keith greeted me right away and was very helpful.  If you can afford their furniture, I would recommend Holley's.

resp.text:
DoubleSword please tell me the items you are referring to.  I can assure you we are not expensive if you compare apples to apples.  Many items may look alike,  but are very different when you consider that in many pieces of furniture,  70% of what you're paying for you can't see. A Flexsteel sofa may cost more than other brands,  but with very good reason. Our price along with free delivery,  are competitive with anyone. We have people from out if town to shop with us because our prices are lower!  Compare apples to apples and combine that with our staff and service and you see why Holley's has been around since 1960. Thank you and please contact me with any specific pieces you feel are higher than other stores.

Ralph Holley

name: Stephanie Daughtry
text: Ralph and the crew at Holley's are very helpful and patient.  We looked at a couch for several weeks before making the purchase.  The price was very good for the wonderful quality furniture that it has been.  Will definitely shop again!

The owner & staff was wonderful & patient while helping me to choose the perfect patio furniture. Very warm & friendly atmosphere, with no sales pressure. They really do want you to be happy. Delivery was made on time & they were as excited as I was to see it.
Beautiful furniture & incredible people - don't miss out on this experience!!

name: Mark Cecil
text: As someone that has been in retail for over 30 years I can honestly say I have never encountered a company that did more right than these folks do. From excellent help in the showroom, to a very nice handwritten thank you card, to a courtesy call when our furniture arrived (early by the way) by one of the friendliest voices I have ever heard, to the nicest and most professional delivery I could not be happier. Oh and by the way due to our large invoice we even got some free pillows. I gave 5 stars because I can't give 6!!!!

resp.text: Mark, thank you so much for your kind words! We are always so happy to hear that our customers had a great experience and are enjoying their purchase. We hope that you come back in and see us!

name: Joseph Gray
text: This furniture doesn't even need cushions. It is perfect support. Its high in price but its got a lifetime warranty to back it up. EDIT: I forgot to mention they did throw in free pillows, free delivery all assembled, a hand written thank you and polite the entire way through.

resp.text:
Hi Joseph,
Thank you for the review and we are glad to hear you are enjoying your furniture. Breezesta furniture is a great product!

I wish I could order one of those gliders to be shipped to me in Texas, way better than trying to pay huge furniture prices here. #everythingisbiggerinTexas

text: I love Watson Brothers. My husband bought a pellet grill here. They're always so friendly and have great products. And, best of all, they love when I bring me dog by.

text: Mac and Art are the best! The grill selection and customer service can’t be beat!

name: Andrew Wamberg
text: I ended up buying a Memphis Grill from Watson Brothers over the phone after several competing dealers in Atlanta simply didn't provide the customer experience that I would have expected for someone selling a high end pellet grill. From the moment Art answered the phone, the experience was a night and day difference compared to the level of service I was provided in person at 2 dealers in my own home town. Both Art and Mac bring a level of passion and expertise to every conversation we have and I look forward to the opportunity to do more business with them in the future. name: Stephen Mitchum

I called up to Lake Martin Mini Mall not long ago to acquire about getting a lid for it, and they looked it up and got it to me in no time. I really appreciated them going out of their way to special order it for me. Their customer service is impeccable. We are always treated like “friends” there and I love that! If your looking for Big Green Egg grills and accessories, outdoor pottery and concrete items or outdoor furniture, this is your place. You need to just go by and see for yourself all they offer. name: Steve H.
text:
Everyone has an idea of what "mall" means.  The Lake Martin Mini Mall doesn't really fit any definition that you're thinking of, though.  Although there's a lot of neat stuff inside, there aren't several separate, discrete stores or booths...it's all one business.

Drive by and you'll just see the concrete figurals outside.  We did that probably a dozen times, spread across our stays around Lake Martin.  As we were departing the area this week, my lady wanted to get her sister a garden ornament, so we popped in.  The management/owner(s) need to find a way to alert passersby that there is a plethora of neat stuff inside.  Crafty stuff, touristy stuff, paddleboards, Big Green Eggs, and who knows what else.  We were pinched for time, so I didn't have the opportunity to wander hither and yon, but if you're in the area, you could while away some time here.

Nice folks and a very clean bathroom.  Pick up a Lake Martin shirt or three, wander around and ogle the concrete statuary and wonder who would install that much gaudy in their yard.  Although the life-sized Great Dane figures were cool.  If I had a suitably-sized abode, I'd drop one of those things in the foyer or on the porch.

text: Had absolutely the best experience in there today! My designer, Ashley, was SO kind and attentive. I know I did not give the clearest description of what I wanted but she figured it. I couldn’t be more pleased! I am so excited for my furniture to come!

name: Tava Chandler
text: I recently needed to furnish several rooms in our new home. Ashley White came to my home and listened to my needs, measured my spaces, and helped me to identify the pieces needed for each room. Ashley was very knowledgeable and helped make the process of selecting finishes and fabrics enjoyable. Her assistance helped me to be confident in my choices.

resp.text:
Hello Tava!  Thank you for taking the time to share insight regarding your experience with designer Ashley White at the Birmingham Design Center. Ashley is an exceptional designer who actively listens to understand her clients’ needs. From there, Ashley helps them navigate the many custom options while narrowing down on the functional solutions that reflect their style and design preference. Thank you so much for your 5-Star Review. We are happy to hear that you have enjoyed your experience and hope that your furnishings bring you joy for many years to come!
- Birmingham Design Center

name: Cynthia Parker
text: My experience at Ethan Allen has been extremely stress free and pleasant. This is due primarily to the friendly, yet professional service of Ashley White.  Her eye for design along with her helpful guidance (actually visiting the space in my home) has made the purchase of my new bed room décor a cinch! Looking forward to purchasing more excellent quality furniture as well as working with Ashley. I appreciate the time she put into making this experience a great one!

resp.text:
Hi Cynthia! Thank You for providing insight about your experience at the Birmingham Design Center. We are so glad that you all decided to give Ethan Allen a try at earning your business. Professional Designer Ashley White actively listens to her client’s needs and concerns in order to tailor solutions that are both functional and aesthetically appealing. Ashley is ecstatic that you enjoyed the design process in entirety. Cynthia, Thank You the 5-Star Rating and for choosing us to be a part of your home furnishing experience!
-Birmingham Design Center

name: Alexa Mallard
text: Ashley was a great help in finding the perfect bed to compliment our EA furniture we bought twenty years ago. She was creative and a great communicator who  helped me visualize a new look. The Hoover store was clean and had several things in place to ensure safety and health during the pandemic.

resp.text: Hi Alexa, thank you for your review. Ashley is a great asset to our team in Birmingham. Safety has always been a focus for Ethan Allen, and especially during this current challenge we are committed to keeping our staff and clients safe.  Sincerely, Steven Crosby

name: Mary Neil
text: Ashley was very helpful in the showroom and drawing layouts with pricing.  She reached out, was good at communicating, sharing her cell and email. Ashley made it easy and quick working on our sectional, developing the final scheme and completing pricing for our order.  We are very pleased.

resp.text: Hi Mary, thank you so much for the feedback. We are happy that you enjoyed your experience with Ashley at our Birmingham Design Center. Sincerely, Steven Crosby

name: Elizabeth Reed
text: Remodeling a kitchen after a house fire is stressful, to say the least.  Our kitchen table and chairs came from Ethan Allen nearly 20 years ago so I went back to them to see if they had counter hight stools that would coordinate with existing furniture.  Ashley White knew exactly what I was looking for.  She suggested the perfect leg and finish based on a photo of my table and chairs.  Our new stools were just delivered and they are perfection!  It's always a pleasure to shop in Ethan Allen.  Thank you Ashley, for also making it fun!

resp.text: Hi Elizabeth, thank you for such great feedback on your experience with Ethan Allen. We are so glad you were able to work with Ashley and she took such great care of you. Sincerely, Steven Crosby

name: john placey
text: We have enjoyed owning Ethan Allen furniture and furnishings over the decades!  Some pieces like our dining room chairs and table still look and feel brand new even though purchased in the early 1970s!  Their staff is always friendly and helpful!  A bit pricey but we have found that you truly get to enjoy what you paid for!!!

name: Ronald Payne
text: After searching many stores, we found our perfect dining room table at our local Ethan Allen and it was on sale. The table had two leaves which would be needed to host our large family group for Thanksgiving. The sales lady was most helpful and promised that it would be delivered before Thanksgiving only about six weeks away. We were kept informed every step on the way and our table arrived four days prior to Thanksgiving. The leaves are a little hard to get in and out but that should get better with more use. We love the table!

resp.text: Ronald, I am so happy to hear about your experience! We love when the process goes smoothly. I know you will enjoy your table for many Thanksgivings to come. Thank you for reaching out to let us know, we appreciate it.

name: Catherine Benefield
text: The whole experience with Ethan Allen has been pleasant and productive. Designer Kelley Horton guided me through the process of selecting furniture (sofa, 2 chairs, ottomans) and fabrics. The furniture was delivered by professionals who NOT ONCE bumped a wall or door frame. They carefully set up the furniture and carted away the wrappings. The designer then brought paint samples and assisted in selecting a paint color for the walls. From start to finish, I was treated with professionalism and courtesy. The furniture is well made, beautiful in my home, and most importantly, comfortable. Will I purchase from Ethan Allen on Hwy. 150 in Hoover again? Absolutely.

resp.text: Hi Catherine! Thank you for taking the time to write about your wonderful experience at our Hoover location. We appreciate it very much! We are pleased to hear that Kelley could make designing your home a breeze and know it MUST look beautiful. Thank you for also pointing out how amazing our delivery team was; they are quite the asset to Ethan Allen! We hope you enjoy your beautiful pieces for many years to come and appreciate your business very much.

name: Amy Rickles
text: Ashely did a great job of helping us pick a style of furniture, wood accents, and fabric. Well worth the time and money spent. Would highly recommend.

resp.text:
Thank you so much for your kind words, Amy. We really appreciate you taking the time out to share your experience with us. Ashley is a huge asset to our Birmingham team!

Cheers,

Ethan Allen

name: Cameron al Shaqar
text: Kelly, at Ethan Allen, was so fantastic!! She took so much time out for me & assisted me with choosing the fabric for my cornices and curtains. I love my new curtains!!! The reason I rated 3 stars is because Ethan Allen is way over priced I found the same rug I was going to buy from Ethan Allen at RH for much less. I understand Ethan Allen has nice fabrics but I've seen much nicer for far less.

resp.text: Cameron, thank you so much for the feedback! I am so thrilled to hear that you are enjoying your new curtains! Custom curtains can be a big project, I am so happy that Kelly was able to partner with you and design and implement something you love.

name: Pat Ford
text: Great purchasing and service experience! Ashley greeted us warmly when we arrived and quickly showed us what we were looking for and provided material samples that were perfect for our needs.  She made the whole process quick and easy.  The delivery guys were the best I have ever seen.  They  handled the new chairs and sofa with care and were careful to not damage our wood floor in moving the sofa into place.

resp.text: Thank you for the five-star review Pat! We're happy to hear everything went perfect during your delivery and that our team did an excellent job as well. Thanks for taking the time to write about us. We know Ashley appreciates your compliment as well!

name: Sherry Vaughn
text:
I have been buying Ethan Allen furniture for over 25 years because I know their furniture is a quality product and is timeless. But the thing that I have come to appreciate the most about Ethan Allen is their free design service. The designers know their business well and do a great job.
Kelley and Lauren with Hoover Ethan Allen have both been so helpful with my current home renovation.
I literally cannot praise Kelley Horton enough for how she has helped me to transform my home into a more modern and updated style utilizing what I currently have and incorporating new pieces to blend. She has spent countless hours  in helping me to choose the right pieces for my home including furniture, window treatments, rugs, artwork, bedding, and even down to the smallest decorative accent pieces. My home looks beautifully done with effortless design and functionality now.
The entire process from designing to delivery and installation has been very professional and I could not have asked for better.

resp.text: Thank you for this awesome review Sherry! It brings us so much joy to know how appreciated our brand is and that everyone on our team gives their all. Kelley goes above and beyond for her clients so we're glad to hear that you find her as special as we do! We know every detail matters and strive to ensure that our customer service is superb. Thank you again for all your kind words Sherry. Enjoy your newly renovated home!

name: Randy Mason
text: My wife and I were on vacation and staying at the hotel next door and decided to browse.  Ashley did such an awesome job reviewing and showing us the bed we looking for we bought one that day. We could have waited until we got home to Michigan but really liked the kind and genuine service that Ashley provided. That was our first time in an Ethan Allen store and we have now set up a home appointment back in Michigan. Thank you Ashley!!

resp.text: Thank you for the five star review, Randy! We are delighted to hear how welcoming Ashley was and greatly appreciate you stopping by. Thanks for joining the Ethan Allen family!

name: Emma Bolden
text: From browsing the store to having my pieces delivered, the entire process of buying furniture from the Ethan Allen in Hoover was a dream. We were greeted warmly as we came in the store, and designer Kelley Horton was extremely helpful and kind (and funny!). The delivery crew was prompt, respectful, and careful. An excellent experience all-around!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind review of our Hoover location, Emma! We're happy to hear that Kelley made your experience with Ethan Allen a delightful one and that our delivery team took it one step further. We appreciate your business!

name: Alissa Hill
text: I would never purchase from Ethan Allen for anything that has to be made like furniture! We purchase a formal dining table and ten chairs to accompany it. Not only did our table show up with a large dent underneath (unfortunately we didn’t notice until the delivery men sped away) which they refused to do anything about but we placed the order in June 2019.... it’s now October 29 we still have no chairs. Their customer service department has been zero help with figuring out why. I would expect this from Wayfair  but when you spend over 6000.00 dollars for a table and chairs you expect far superior customer service. Guess I’ve learned my lesson and will forever stay out of Ethan Allen.

resp.text:
Alissa, I am so sorry to hear about your experience. I would love to look into it further and find a resolution but I am unfortunately not able to locate your order. Was it possibly purchased under another name? Or could you provide a phone number or order number? If you wouldn't mind emailing me at laura.smith@ethanallen.com I would love to see what we can do to make this situation right.

I look forward to working with you on a resolution.

Laura

name: Hazel Summerville
text: Bought an expensive leather sleeper sofa with anvair mattress that does not work! Call and representative cam out verified slow leas in air bed. NO OTHER RESPONSE!

resp.text: Hazel, I am so sorry to hear your feedback. I reached out to the store and they confirmed that they have been in contact with you. The replacement air mattress has been ordered and they have the estimated promise date to pass along to you. Thank you so much for taking the time to let us know. We look forward to resolving the issue.

name: Brian Calhoun
text: Ashley White was a pleasure to work with at the Hoover Ethan Allen.  It's really hard to get my wife and I on the same page when it comes to decorating.   Ashley did a great job listening to both of us as well as seeing some of our style when she came to our house for the initial assessment.  She was very patient and came up with great suggestions of things that would work well in our space and with the existing furniture we had.  At the end of the process we now have a room full of art that gives us a finished and professional look.  Thanks Ashley!

resp.text: Brian, thank you so much for the wonderful feedback! We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed Ashley's talent as much as we do!

name: Lynn Meany
text: I bought 6 dining chairs, picked out fabric and even ordered extra fabric to make pillows with.  I received excellent service!  Everything arrived on time in perfect condition.   Top notch quality furniture, pleasant sales team, willingness to work to please you...I wouldn't hesitate to shop here again.  Thank you Lauren for all your help!

resp.text: Lynn, Thank you for the feedback! We are thrilled to hear that the experience was perfect and can't wait to work with you again.

name: Becky Charton
text: Ashley at Ethan Allen in Hoover was so patience  with my Aunt and I, she stayed late, called us back after hours and  did not hesitate when asked hard questions! After shopping all over Birmingham EA had some of the most stylish offerings with beautiful leather selections. Your prices were in line with fair market pricing giving us a high quality and a high design selection. Thanks for meeting all our needs!

resp.text: Becky, thank you so much for the feedback. We are thrilled to hear that Ethan Allen was just what you were looking for! We agree with you, Ashley is amazing! I'm happy to hear you adore her as much as we do!  Thank you so much for taking the time to let us know. We appreciate it!

name: Lisa Bice
text: Ashley White is wonderful to work with! - She is professional, intuitive and creative in her approach to pulling together furniture ideas, as well as accessories. I walked in to the store the first day knowing specific items we needed to replace, but did not even know where to begin to find what would work best for our home, with things we already have and want to keep. She asked questions, REALLY listened, and that's where her innate creativity kicked in. She has "nailed it" time after time with unique suggestions, and I look forward to working with her again as we update this home. I have not seen this 5 star level of customer service that Ashley delivers in a long time, and Ethan Allen is fortunate to have this jewel! And we LOVE our new pieces - the quality is wonderful, too! Thank you Ashley!  Lisa Bice

resp.text: Wow, Lisa thank you for this awesome review! We couldn't agree more. Ashley is amazing! We love hearing how appreciated her design service was and that you're home came together beautifully. We strive for quality products and try to ensure our clients receive nothing short of perfection. Thank you for working with us!

text: he was remebering we was doing a class play of him we remeber u

resp.text: Thank you so much for the 5 star review! I'm so glad to hear that you remember the wonderful Ethan Allen! We are so honored to have our company named after such an amazing part of history.

name: Edgar A
text: Does not return calls. They lied to us on several occassions.  Gave us a receipt and when we went to pick up the item they told us the price was incorrect. They will not let us take it per the price on the reciept because it was priced incorrectly.  On a separate item we purchased did not come with the hardware.  When we asked them about it they told us they are universal screws!  Go to Lowes or Home Depot and ask for universal furniture screws!  Called corporate no help! Don't waste your time. Called Peach Tree, GA and they ordered what i needed in 3 minutes.If you want Ethan Allen go to Peach Tree, GA.  If you want better service go to Wal-Mart.

name: Michael Shelby
text: Always friendly and quality furniture.

resp.text:
Michael,
Thank you so much for the feedback!  We take a lot of pride in what we do and the items we create and love seeing comments like this so we can share with our Design Staff and our plants.  We appreciate the kind words and look forward to seeing you in the Design Center soon!
Thanks, again,
Shane

name: Amy Johnston
text: Pricey. Not a great selection.

resp.text:
Thank you Amy for taking the time to leave a review. Ethan Allen is high end furniture and intended to last, we stand by our quality and craftsmanship, this is where you see the difference in the pricing from us to the other brands. The pricing is in line with the high end market for these reasons. We offer a complimentary design service with talented professional designers who are there to help as much or as little as you would like. We also offer Great, flexible finance options. Ethan Allen is always working to stay relevant with the trends but keeping our classic options still available, introducing new introductions every few months.

We appreciate you taking the time to visit our Design Center and wish you luck on you search for the right selections for your home!

text: Nice store but the workers are very nasty. Several times I have been in this store only to walk in and be ignoted not even a hello may i help you. I am so sorry I am not dressed up in heelsholding a Gucci or Coach bag! Very disappointing that you treat potential customers who may have come in to make a purchase. I have walked out all these times because of this one thing calles "ACKNOWLEDGEMENT". Iknow these workers do not live in a multi million dollar home but what gives them the right to act all high and mighty. Each time i have gone thinking maybe this time someone will at least say "Hello, welcome. Is thier anything I can help you with?" Nothing! You have no idea whether people have money to spend there or not and refardless you should treat people with cimmon courtesy. It is not alot to ask. Meanwhile about 4 stores down at Williams and Sinoma they are extremely friendly. Shame on you for your snotty attitudes.

name: Helen H. Gonzalez
text: The day of, the associate called and confirmed and asked if I could have the space cleared for a more efficient delivery. I did just that! But after I had donated my old room furniture, I received a call stating I would not get my new furniture due to the delivery truck breaking down. I was livid because I have a fully breastfed 8 month old and we now have to sleep on the floor. Surely I couldn't feed her in the middle of the night on a sofa. After explaining that to the manager he simply said "well, things happen". He did not offer any extra assistance. I offered to pick up the furniture myself and have 2 gentlemen ride with me to put it together because I was the last delivery for the day. I brainstormed solutions and he simply said no. He did not offer compensation for my inconvenience, NOTHING. The day of the delivery, the young man delivering my furniture was very sweet, professional and because I could not be there to observe their proficiency and accuracy,

text: Took my money.  Have not had the Christmas present delivered yet.  Plenty of excuses and no refund yet.  The present was for a handicap mother.  Do not shop here.  Phone call to handicap mom stated you would refund credit card and you want to add it to the list of lies? First week, chair was not in the warehouse in Atlanta.  Second week it was raining.  Third week excuse was death in the family.  Fourth week no delivery no phone call.  You never contacted the buyer which was me.  Just made stress on the handicapped mom.  You can call me names.  I in turn will not call you names.  I will wait for the refund on the card and you have my phone number since you will not answer my call.  I will pray for you also.
